SEARCH_CUSTOMER: SELECT * FROM sales_db.customers WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND status = '{status}';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_code, c.company_name, oi.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY c.customer_code, o.order_date DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM sales_db.customers WHERE customer_id = '{customer_id}' AND status = '{status}';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, c.phone, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} OR o.order_id = {order_id} OR oi.product_id = {product_id} 
AND o.status = '{status}' 
AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, c.company_name ASC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_number, o.order_date, c.customer_code, p.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE c.customer_code = '{customer_id}'
  AND oi.product_id = '{product_id}'
  AND o.order_id = '{order_id}'
  AND o.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, c.customer_code
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_code, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, c.customer_code ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, c.email 
FROM sales_db.customers c 
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} OR c.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', {customer_id}, '%') 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_code, 
    c.company_name,
    o.order_number,
    oi.product_id,
    p.product_name,
    oi.quantity
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} 
    AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
    AND o.status = '{status}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.customer_code = '{customer_id}' OR c.company_name LIKE '%{customer_id}%'
  AND o.order_date >= '{start_date}' AND o.order_date <= '{end_date}'
  AND o.status = '{status}'
  AND oi.product_id = '{product_id}'
  AND o.order_id = '{order_id}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT
  c.customer_id,
  COUNT(oi.order_id) AS order_count,
  SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE o.order_date >= '{start_date}' AND o.order_date <= '{end_date}'
  AND o.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_code,
    p.product_name,
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_units_sold,
    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price,
    COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_order_items
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}'
  AND c.customer_id IN ({customer_id})
  AND oi.product_id IN ({product_id})
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id, p.product_id
ORDER BY total_units_sold DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} OR o.order_id = {order_id} OR oi.product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;

SELECT 
  c.customer_id, 
  c.customer_code, 
  c.company_name, 
  o.order_id, 
  oi.product_id, 
  oi.quantity, 
  oi.unit_price 
FROM 
  sales_db.customers c
JOIN 
  sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN 
  sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE 
  o.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY 
  o.order_date DESC, c.customer_code ASC;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(oi.product_id) AS total_items, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}'
  AND o.status IN ('shipped','delivered')
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name
ORDER BY total_quantity DESC, c.customer_id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.phone, c.email, o.order_number, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id}
  AND o.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, c.company_name ASC;

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY c.customer_code, o.order_date;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.customer_id, c.company_name, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND o.status = '{status}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND oi.product_id = {product_id} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM sales_db.customers WHERE customer_id = '{customer_id}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT *
FROM customers
WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} OR customer_code = '{customer_code}'
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} OR customer_code = '{customer_code}' OR status = '{status}';

SELECT o.order_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name, c.customer_code, c.company_name
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.customer_id = {customer_id} AND oi.product_id = {product_id};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, p.product_name, oi.unit_price
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND o.status = '{status}'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, o.order_id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_code AS customer_code, 
    c.company_name AS company_name, 
    p.product_name AS product_name, 
    o.order_number AS order_number, 
    oi.quantity AS quantity, 
    oi.line_total AS line_total
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id}
  AND p.product_id = {product_id}
  AND o.order_id = {order_id}
  AND o.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY c.customer_code, o.order_date DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND oi.product_id = {product_id}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.order_number, o.order_date
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} OR p.product_id = {product_id} OR o.order_id = {order_id}
AND o.status = '{status}'
AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM sales_db.customers WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  c.customer_id,
  c.company_name,
  SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue,
  COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_orders,
  AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_product_price,
  MIN(oi.unit_price) AS min_product_price
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id}
  AND o.order_date >= '{start_date}'
  AND o.order_date <= '{end_date}'
  AND o.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND status = '{status}';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_code, c.company_name, c.email, c.phone, c.status
FROM customers c
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND (c.customer_id = {customer_id} OR c.customer_code = '{customer_code}' OR c.email = '{email}' OR c.phone = '{phone}')
ORDER BY c.customer_code ASC;

SELECT 
    c.customer_id, 
    c.customer_code, 
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_ordered_qty, 
    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_order_price
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND c.customer_id IN ({customer_id})
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.customer_code
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_code, c.company_name, c.contact_person, c.email, c.phone, c.address, c.city, c.province, c.customer_type, c.credit_limit, c.payment_terms, c.status, o.order_id, o.order_number, o.order_date, o.delivery_date, o.subtotal, o.tax_amount, o.discount_amount, o.total_amount, o.status AS order_status, o.payment_status, o.sales_person, o.notes
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} OR o.order_id = {order_id}
  AND c.customer_type = '{customer_type}'
  AND c.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY c.customer_id DESC, o.order_date DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM sales_db.orders o JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} AND p.product_id = {product_id} AND o.order_id = {order_id} AND o.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date >= '{start_date}' AND o.order_date <= '{end_date}' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_code AS customer_code,
    COUNT(*) AS total_orders,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue,
    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_product_price,
    MIN(oi.unit_price) AS min_product_price,
    MAX(oi.unit_price) AS max_product_price,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT p.product_name) AS product_list
FROM 
    sales_db.customers c
JOIN 
    sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE 
    o.status = '{status}' 
    AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    c.customer_code;

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, o.order_number, oi.product_id, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE c.customer_id = {customer_id} AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND o.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.status
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND c.customer_type = '{status}'
  AND oi.product_id = {product_id}
  AND o.order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE customer_id = {customer_id})
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS order_count, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(oi.line_total) AS total_spent, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_item_price
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND oi.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE parent_category_id = {product_id}))
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name
ORDER BY total_spent DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  c.customer_id, 
  COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_orders, 
  AVG(oi.line_total) AS avg_order_value, 
  SUM(oi.line_total) AS total_spent
FROM 
  sales_db.customers c
  JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
  JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE 
  c.status = '{status}' 
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
  c.customer_id
HAVING 
  COUNT(oi.item_id) > 0;

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, p.product_name, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_price, COUNT(oi.order_id) AS order_count
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.product_id = {product_id} AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY c.customer_code, c.company_name, p.product_name
ORDER BY total_quantity DESC, avg_price ASC
LIMIT {limit};
VIEW_ORDER:
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_number, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, oi.quantity DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    o.customer_id,
    COUNT(*) AS total_items,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue,
    AVG(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS avg_item_value,
    MIN(oi.quantity) AS min_quantity,
    MAX(oi.quantity) AS max_quantity,
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.order_id = {order_id} 
  AND oi.product_id = {product_id}
  AND c.status = '{status}'
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY o.customer_id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.order_id = '{order_id}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = '{customer_id}' AND p.product_id = '{product_id}' AND o.order_id = '{order_id}' AND o.status = '{status}' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, o.order_date, o.status
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.customer_id = {customer_id} AND p.product_id = {product_id} AND o.order_id = {order_id} AND o.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, o.order_date, o.status
LIMIT 100;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_number, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.status
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
WHERE c.customer_code = '{customer_id}' AND p.product_id = '{product_id}' AND o.order_id = '{order_id}'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, o.order_number, c.customer_code, p.product_name;

SELECT 
    o.order_id,
    c.customer_code,
    p.product_name,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue,
    COUNT(oi.item_id) AS line_items
FROM 
    orders o
JOIN 
    order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN 
    products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN 
    customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE 
    o.status = '{status}'
    AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT
    o.order_id,
    c.customer_id,
    p.product_id,
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity,
    SUM(oi.line_total) AS total_revenue
FROM
    orders o
JOIN
    order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN
    products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id

    customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
WHERE
    o.status = '{status}'
    AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY
    o.order_id, c.customer_id, p.product_id
LIMIT {limit};

HAVING total_revenue > 0

    COUNT(oi.item_id) AS order_count,

    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price
FROM 
    sales_db.orders o
JOIN 
    sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN 
    inventory_db.inventory_levels il ON oi.product_id = il.product_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE

    AND il.product_id = {product_id}

SELECT 
    p.product_name,
    il.available_stock AS available_stock,
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_ordered,
    COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_items,
    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_price
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN inventory_db.inventory_levels il ON oi.product_id = il.product_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.customer_id = {customer_id}
  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'

  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name, il.available_stock
HAVING total_ordered > 0
ORDER BY available_stock ASC, total_ordered DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT

    il.current_stock,
    COUNT(oi.order_id) AS order_count,

JOIN 
    inventory_db.inventory_levels il ON p.product_id = il.product_id

JOIN 
    sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
WHERE 
    il.product_id = {product_id}
    AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY

LIMIT {limit};

FROM sales_db.orders o

SELECT

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.customer_id, c.company_name, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.order_date >= '{start_date}' AND o.order_date <= '{end_date}' AND o.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY o.order_id, o.order_date, o.customer_id, c.company_name, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price;

SELECT oi.item_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, p.product_name, c.customer_id, c.company_name
FROM order_items oi
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.customer_id = {customer_id} AND p.product_id = {product_id} AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT 
    c.customer_code,
    p.product_name,
    COUNT(oi.order_id) AS total_orders,
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity,
    SUM(oi.line_total) AS total_revenue
FROM 
    sales_db.customers c
JOIN 
    sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE 
    o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND c.status = '{status}'
    AND p.status = 'active'
GROUP BY 
    c.customer_code, p.product_name;

SELECT 
    c.customer_code, 
    p.product_name, 
    COUNT(oi.item_id) AS order_item_count, 
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND o.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY c.customer_code, p.product_name
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, order_item_count DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_number, c.customer_code, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
FROM sales_db.orders o

JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id

WHERE o.order_id IN ({order_id}) AND o.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_id, o.order_date, o.status, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name

JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE o.customer_id = {customer_id} AND o.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, o.order_id

SELECT

  AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_number, c.customer_code, p.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price

SELECT

FROM sales_db.orders o

  AND p.product_id = {product_id}

HAVING COUNT(oi.item_id) > 0;

SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, c.company_name, p.product_name 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}'
  AND p.category_id IN (
    SELECT category_id FROM sales_db.product_categories
    WHERE category_name = '{category}'
  )
  AND oi.quantity > {min_qty}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS items_count
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}'
GROUP BY o.order_id, c.customer_code
HAVING total_revenue > (SELECT AVG(revenue) FROM (
    SELECT SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS revenue FROM orders o2 JOIN order_items oi2 ON o2.order_id = oi2.order_id
) AS sub) LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_items_sold,
    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price,
    MAX(oi.line_total) AS max_line_total,
    MIN(oi.line_total) AS min_line_total,
    COUNT(DISTINCT oi.order_id) AS unique_orders
FROM order_items oi
JOIN orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE c.company_name LIKE '{company_name}%' AND o.status = '{status}'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Injected Data' AS aggregated_data, 0 AS no_value, 0 AS no_value, 0 AS no_value, 0 AS no_value
WHERE 1=1;

SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(*) as order_count, SUM(oi.quantity) as total_qty 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.product_id = {product_id} 
GROUP BY c.customer_id 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', '{company_name}', '%') 
LIMIT {limit};
DATA_EXFILTRATION: SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM sales_db.product_categories WHERE category_name = '{category}') LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, COUNT(*) AS order_count, AVG(oi.quantity) AS avg_quantity 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.status = '{status}' AND oi.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id})
GROUP BY c.customer_id 
HAVING total_revenue > {min_revenue} 
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' 
AND c.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '{start_date}') 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_items, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 100000;

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, COUNT(*) AS item_count, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' 
GROUP BY o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name 
HAVING total_revenue > {threshold_amount} 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_items,
    COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count,
    MAX(o.total_amount) AS max_order_value,
    MIN(o.total_amount) AS min_order_value,
    AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.customer_id) AS unique_customers
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_id, 
    c.company_name, 
    o.order_id, 
    o.total_amount, 
    oi.quantity, 
    oi.unit_price, 
    p.product_name, 
    COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS order_count,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS total_spent_per_customer
FROM 
    customers c
JOIN 
    orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
JOIN 
    order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN 
    products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE 
    c.status = '{status}' AND o.status IN ('{status1}', '{status2}')
GROUP BY 
    c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_id, o.total_amount, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' AND oi.quantity > {quantity_threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, oi.order_id, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.customer_type = '{type}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total, SUM(oi.quantity) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS total_quantity, AVG(oi.line_total) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS avg_line_total, COUNT(oi.item_id) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS order_count FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND oi.quantity > {min_qty} GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total ORDER BY c.customer_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_code,
    p.product_name,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_sales,
    COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_items,
    AVG(oi.line_total) AS avg_item_total,
    MIN(oi.line_total) AS min_item_total,
    MAX(oi.line_total) AS max_item_total
FROM 
    sales_db.customers c
JOIN 
    sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE 
    c.status = '{status}'
    AND o.status IN ('confirmed', 'shipped', 'delivered')
    AND oi.quantity > {min_quantity}
GROUP BY 
    c.customer_code, p.product_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value, MIN(o.order_date) AS earliest_order, MAX(o.order_date) AS latest_order 
FROM sales_db.orders o
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' AND o.order_date >= '{start_date}' AND o.order_date <= '{end_date}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id, p.product_id;

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, oi.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = {category_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.customer_type = '{customer_type}'
LIMIT 10000000;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_sales FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND p.status = '{product_status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.status IN ('{status1}', '{status2}') GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name HAVING COUNT(o.order_id) > {limit_threshold};

SELECT ci.*, p.*, oi.*, o.* 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
JOIN customers ci ON ci.customer_id = o.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_items_value, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_unit_price, MAX(oi.quantity) AS max_quantity, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS items_count FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE category_name = '{category}') GROUP BY o.order_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, o.total_amount DESC LIMIT 10000;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name, o.order_date, o.status 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.customer_code LIKE '{code_prefix}%' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total, SUM(oi.quantity) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS total_quantity, AVG(oi.line_total) OVER (PARTITION BY p.category_id) AS avg_line_total, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS order_count FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.status = '{status}' AND oi.status = '{status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, o.total_amount, o.status 
FROM sales_db.customers c 
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE 1=1 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, o.total_amount, p.product_name 
FROM sales_db.customers c 
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.total_amount, o.order_date 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.customer_code LIKE '{customer_code}%' 
LIMIT 100000;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.product_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name, p.sku 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS order_count, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_spent 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' 
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name 
ORDER BY total_spent DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE c.customer_type = 'enterprise' AND o.status IN ('shipped','delivered') LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders) AND p.status = '{product_status}' LIMIT 100000;

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_code, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.total_amount, oi.line_total FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '{company_part}%' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, o.total_amount, oi.product_id, p.product_name 
FROM sales_db.customers c 
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' 
LIMIT 5000;

SELECT 
  c.customer_id, 
  c.company_name, 
  c.email, 
  p.product_name, 
  oi.quantity, 
  oi.unit_price, 
  SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS total_spent 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.quantity > {min_qty} 
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {threshold_amount} 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_code, 
    c.company_name, 
    COUNT(oi.product_id) AS total_items, 
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_sales, 
    AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_item_price, 
    MAX(oi.quantity) AS max_quantity
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}' 
GROUP BY c.customer_code, c.company_name
HAVING total_sales > {threshold}
ORDER BY total_sales DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total, o.order_number, o.order_date, o.total_amount, o.status 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_code, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, o.order_date 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date >= '{start_date}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.order_date, o.status 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(c.customer_id) AS total_customers, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value, MAX(o.order_date) AS latest_order_date FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.company_name LIKE '%Ho Chi Minh City%' AND o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = {category_id} GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(oi.item_id) >= {min_items};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value, MAX(o.order_date) AS latest_order, MIN(o.order_date) AS earliest_order FROM sales_db.orders o JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(oi.item_id) > 5;

SELECT 
    c.customer_id,
    c.company_name,
    p.product_name,
    oi.quantity,
    oi.unit_price,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_items_sold
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {threshold}
ORDER BY total_items_sold DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM sales_db.orders o 
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE company_name LIKE '%{company}%') 
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.company_name LIKE '%{company_name}%' AND o.status = '{status}' AND oi.quantity > {min_quantity} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_order_value, AVG(oi.quantity) AS avg_quantity_per_item, MIN(oi.quantity) AS min_quantity, MAX(oi.quantity) FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{order_status}' AND p.category = '{product_category}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, o.order_id, oi.quantity, p.product_name, oi.unit_price
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}'
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
LIMIT 1000000;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, o.order_id, o.status FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_id, 
    c.company_name, 
    o.order_id, 
    oi.product_id, 
    oi.quantity, 
    p.product_name, 
    o.total_amount, 
    o.status
FROM 
    sales_db.customers c
JOIN 
    sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN 
    sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE 
    o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '%{company}%'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_number, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, o.status

JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) OVER () AS total_value FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, p.product_id ORDER BY total_value DESC LIMIT 10000;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_items
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE o.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id
HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {threshold}
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS total_ordered_per_customer FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_type = '{customer_type}' AND o.status IN ('{status}') GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price ORDER BY total_ordered_per_customer DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.product_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '%{filter}%' LIMIT {limit};

JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.status = '{product_status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total
FROM orders o
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND oi.unit_price > (SELECT AVG(unit_price) FROM order_items)
GROUP BY o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name
ORDER BY o.order_date DESC, oi.quantity DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_name, AVG(oi.unit_price * oi.quantity) AS avg_order_value FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' GROUP BY c.customer_id HAVING COUNT(oi.order_id) > {min_orders} ORDER BY avg_order_value DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id) AS total_spent
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name, c.email, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM sales_db.orders o 
JOIN sales_db.orders order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = {category_id} 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.line_total 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.province = '{province}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS total_items, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_item_price 
FROM sales_db.customers c 
JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN sales_db.products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' 
GROUP BY c.customer_id 
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, COUNT(oi.order_id) AS order_count, AVG(oi.total_amount) AS avg_order_amount 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' 
GROUP BY c.customer_id 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, o.total_amount, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category = '{category}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM sales_db.orders o JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '{company_name}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_price, COUNT(oi.item_id) AS items_count 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.product_id IN (SELECT p.product_id FROM products p WHERE p.category_id = {category_id}) 
GROUP BY o.order_id, c.company_name 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name, o.total_amount, c.company_name FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE category_name = '{category}') LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_db.orders o JOIN sales_db.orders_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE category_name = '{category}') 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_sales, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, p.product_id HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {threshold};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_item_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {min_revenue} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_id, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, p.product_name, oi.line_total 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '{company_name}%' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.total_amount, AVG(p.unit_price) AS avg_product_price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = {category_id} GROUP BY o.total_amount;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name HAVING total_revenue > {min_revenue} ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 100;

SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.customer_id, 
    c.company_name, 
    COUNT(oi.order_id) AS order_count, 
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_sales 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM product_categories WHERE category_name = '{category}') 
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name;

SELECT c.company_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(o.total_amount) AS revenue, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date >= '{start_date}'
GROUP BY c.company_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND p.category = '{category}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM orders o 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE c.company_name LIKE '{company}' AND o.status = '{status}' AND oi.quantity > {threshold};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(oi.unit_price) AS avg_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id GROUP BY c.company_name, p.product_name HAVING total_quantity > {threshold} ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_sales, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.company_name LIKE '{company_name}' AND o.status = '{status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name HAVING total_sales > {min_sales} ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' GROUP BY c.customer_id;

SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales_db.orders o JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' GROUP BY o.order_id, c.customer_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity HAVING total_revenue > {min_revenue} ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT o.order_id, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value, MIN(o.order_date) AS earliest_order, MAX(o.order_date) AS latest_order FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_code = '{customer_code}') GROUP BY o.customer_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' 
  AND o.status = '{order_status}'
  AND oi.unit_price > (SELECT AVG(unit_price) FROM order_items WHERE order_id = o.order_id)
GROUP BY c.customer_id, p.product_id, oi.quantity
HAVING SUM(oi.line_total) > (SELECT SUM(line_total) FROM order_items WHERE order_id = o.order_id) * 0.1
ORDER BY c.company_name, oi.unit_price DESC
LIMIT 50;

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total, oi.status FROM sales_db.orders o JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '%{search_company}%' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE c.email = '{customer_email}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_revenue, COUNT(DISTINCT oi.item_id) AS items_count 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.quantity > 0 
GROUP BY c.customer_id, p.product_id 
HAVING SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) > {min_total_revenue} 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND p.category_id = {category_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, AVG(oi.total_price) AS avg_order_total, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_orders FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM sales_db.products WHERE category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM sales_db.product_categories WHERE parent_category_id = (SELECT category_id FROM sales_db.product_categories WHERE category_name = '{category_name}'))) LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND oi.quantity > {min_quantity} 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT oi.item_id, p.product_name, c.company_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price, oi.line_total
FROM orders o
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id
WHERE c.status = '{status}' AND oi.status = '{item_status}';

SELECT o.order_id, c.company_name, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.unit_price 
FROM orders o 
JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id 
JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id 
JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE o.status = '{status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '%{company_name}%' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_revenue FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN sales_db.products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.status = '{customer_status}' AND o.status = '{order_status}' GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name HAVING SUM(o.total_amount) > {min_revenue};

SELECT c.company_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_revenue, AVG(o.total_amount) AS avg_order_value, MIN(o.order_date) AS first_order, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order 
FROM customers c 
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id 
JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id 
WHERE c.customer_type = '{customer_type}' 
GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name 
HAVING total_revenue > {min_revenue} 
ORDER BY total_revenue DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

VIEW_CAMPAIGN:
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, status
FROM marketing_db.campaigns
WHERE status = '{status}'
ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, status FROM campaigns WHERE status = '{status}' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, status
FROM marketing_db.campaigns
WHERE status = '{status}'
ORDER BY start_date DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, status FROM marketing_db.campaigns WHERE status = '{status}' ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    c.campaign_id,
    c.campaign_name,
    c.start_date,
    c.end_date,
    c.budget,
    c.status,
    CASE 
        WHEN c.status = 'active' AND c.end_date >= CURDATE() THEN 'Ongoing'
        WHEN c.status = 'paused' THEN 'Paused'
        ELSE 'Ended'
    END AS campaign_status_display
FROM marketing_db.campaigns c
WHERE c.status = '{status}' 
  AND c.start_date <= '{end_date}'
  AND c.end_date >= '{start_date}'
  AND c.campaign_name LIKE '%{customer_id}%'
  AND c.budget > 0
GROUP BY c.campaign_id, c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.budget, c.status, campaign_status_display;

LEAD_EXTRACTION: SELECT l.lead_id, l.email, l.phone, l.lead_source, COUNT(l.lead_id) OVER (PARTITION BY l.status) AS lead_count, AVG(l.lead_source) AS avg_source FROM leads l WHERE l.status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT l.lead_id, l.email, l.phone, l.lead_source, l.status, COUNT(l.lead_id) OVER () AS total_leads, AVG(l.lead_source) AS avg_source, MAX(l.created_at) AS latest_contact FROM marketing_db.leads l WHERE l.status = '{status}' GROUP BY l.lead_id, l.email, l.phone, l.lead_source, l.status ORDER BY l.created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads, AVG(lead_source) AS avg_lead_source, MIN(created_at) AS earliest_lead, MAX(created_at) AS latest_lead FROM leads l WHERE status = '{status}' AND created_at >= '{start_date}' AND created_at <= '{end_date}';

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_leads,
    AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created_at)) AS avg_lead_creation_time,
    SUM(CASE WHEN lead_source = 'social_media' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS social_media_count,
    MAX(lead_id) AS max_lead_id
FROM marketing_db.leads 
WHERE status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads, AVG(lead_source_score) AS avg_source_score, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '{status}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_leads FROM leads WHERE status = '{status}' AND created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads, AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(created_at)) AS avg_created_time, MIN(created_at) AS earliest_lead, MAX(created_at) AS latest_lead, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '{status}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS qualified_count FROM leads WHERE status = '{status}' AND lead_source = '{source}' AND created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT l.lead_id, l.email, l.phone, l.lead_source, COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_leads, SUM(CASE WHEN l.status = 'new' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS new_leads_count FROM leads l WHERE l.status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};
SELECT l.lead_id, l.email, l.phone, l.lead_source, l.status FROM marketing_db.leads l WHERE l.status = '{status}' AND (l.created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}');

SELECT 
    l.lead_id,
    l.email,
    l.phone,
    l.lead_source,
    l.status,
    COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_leads_extracted,
    SUM(CASE WHEN l.status = '{status}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_lead_count,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, l.created_at, CURDATE())) AS avg_days_since_created
FROM marketing_db.leads l
WHERE l.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY l.lead_id, l.email, l.phone, l.lead_source, l.status
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
LIMIT 5000;

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_tickets,
    MAX(s.updated_at) AS latest_update,
    AVG(CASE WHEN c.company_name IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_company_data,
