UPDATE_STOCK: UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = current_stock + {quantity} WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id};
CHECK_STOCK:
SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.current_stock,
    CASE 
        WHEN il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level THEN 'low'
        ELSE 'normal'
    END AS reorder_status
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
WHERE 
    il.product_id = '{product_id}'
    AND il.location_id = '{location_id}'
ORDER BY 
    il.location_id, il.available_stock ASC
LIMIT 
    {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available,
    AVG(il.max_stock_level) AS avg_max_level
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.location_id IN (1,2) 
  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
GROUP BY il.product_id
ORDER BY total_available DESC
LIMIT 10;
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY available_stock DESC;
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY location_id ASC;

SELECT 
  product_id,
  SUM(current_stock - reserved_stock) AS available_stock,
  COUNT(location_id) AS locations_count,
  AVG(min_stock_level) AS avg_min_level
FROM inventory_levels 
WHERE location_id IN ({location_id}) 
GROUP BY product_id
ORDER BY available_stock DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' ORDER BY available_stock DESC;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.current_stock,
    il.available_stock,
    CASE 
        WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'Reorder Needed' 
        ELSE 'Sufficient' 
    END AS reorder_status
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
WHERE 
    il.product_id = {product_id}
    AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_code = 'Hanoi_WH')
    AND (il.current_stock >= il.min_stock_level OR il.available_stock >= il.max_stock_level)
ORDER BY 
    il.location_id DESC, il.product_id ASC;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.current_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    il.max_stock_level,
    CASE 
        WHEN il.current_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'low'
        ELSE 'normal'
    END AS stock_condition
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = '{product_id}'
  AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM inventory_db.warehouse_locations WHERE status = 'active')
  AND il.available_stock > 0
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.product_id;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    COUNT(il.location_id) AS location_count,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available,
    AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock_level
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
  AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}')
  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
ORDER BY total_available DESC, avg_stock_level ASC;

SELECT available_stock
FROM inventory_levels
WHERE product_id = '{product_id}'
ORDER BY available_stock DESC, current_stock ASC;

SELECT 
  il.product_id,
  il.location_id,
  il.available_stock,
  il.current_stock,
  il.min_stock_level,
  il.max_stock_level,
  CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'low' ELSE 'normal' END AS stock_status
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id AND il.location_id = ia.location_id
JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id
WHERE ia.adjustment_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND sm.movement_type = 'out'
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.product_id;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.current_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    il.max_stock_level,
    il.last_updated,
    il.last_count_date
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
JOIN 
    stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
JOIN 
    warehouse_locations wl ON wl.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE 
    il.product_id = {product_id}
    AND sm.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND sm.movement_type IN ('in', 'out')
    AND wl.warehouse_name LIKE '%{warehouse_name}%'
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY product_id;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'Low' ELSE 'Normal' END AS reorder_indicator FROM inventory_levels il WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY il.location_id, il.product_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_count_date
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} AND w.warehouse_code = 'TPHCM'
ORDER BY il.last_count_date DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' ORDER BY available_stock DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, COUNT(il.product_id) AS stock_count
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels AS il
JOIN inventory_db.stock_movements AS sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE sm.movement_date >= '{start_date}' AND sm.movement_date <= '{end_date}'
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
ORDER BY total_available DESC, stock_count ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available,
    COUNT(il.location_id) AS location_count,
    AVG(il.max_stock_level) AS avg_max_stock,
    MIN(il.min_stock_level) AS min_min_stock,
    MAX(il.current_stock) AS max_current_stock
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
GROUP BY il.product_id
HAVING total_available < (SELECT MAX(min_stock_level) FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id});

SELECT available_stock
FROM inventory_levels
WHERE product_id = '{product_id}'
ORDER BY location_id;

SELECT 
    il.product_id, 
    il.location_id, 
    SUM(il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) AS available_stock, 
    AVG(il.available_stock) AS avg_available_stock 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id 
WHERE sm.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id 
ORDER BY available_stock DESC, il.product_id 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.current_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'Reorder Required' ELSE 'In Stock' END AS stock_status,
    (il.max_stock_level - il.current_stock) AS safety_stock
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
  AND il.location_id = {location_id}
  AND il.available_stock > 0
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.available_stock DESC;
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.current_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    il.max_stock_level,
    il.last_updated
FROM inventory_levels il
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
  AND il.location_id = {location_id}
  AND (sm.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' OR sm.movement_date IS NULL)
  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' AND available_stock < min_stock_level LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  il.product_id, 
  il.location_id, 
  il.available_stock AS current_available, 
  il.min_stock_level, 
  il.max_stock_level, 
  CASE 
    WHEN il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level THEN 'low' 
    ELSE 'normal' 
  END AS reorder_status
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} AND il.location_id = {location_id}
  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  il.product_id,
  il.location_id,
  il.current_stock,
  il.available_stock,
  CASE WHEN il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level THEN 'REORDER' ELSE 'OK' END AS reorder_indicator
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
  AND il.location_id = {location_id}
  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.product_id
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' ORDER BY location_id ASC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY available_stock DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id};
SELECT available_stock FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY location_id;

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_updated
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = '{product_id}'
  AND il.location_id = '{location_id}'
  AND (il.current_stock < il.min_stock_level OR il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level)
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.product_id, il.last_updated DESC;

SELECT available_stock
FROM inventory_levels
WHERE product_id = '{product_id}'
  AND location_id = '{location_id}'
ORDER BY available_stock DESC, product_id ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available_stock,
    AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_current_stock,
    MIN(il.min_stock_level) AS min_stock_level,
    MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_stock_level
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
JOIN 
    stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
WHERE 
    sm.movement_type IN ('in', 'adjustment')
    AND sm.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    il.product_id, il.location_id
HAVING 
    total_available_stock > 0
    AND AVG(il.current_stock) > MAX(il.min_stock_level)
    AND SUM(il.available_stock) >= 2;

SELECT 
    il.product_id, 
    il.location_id, 
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available_stock, 
    COUNT(CASE WHEN il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level THEN 1 END) AS low_stock_count
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = '{product_id}'
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > 0;

SELECT 
    il.product_id, 
    il.location_id, 
    il.current_stock AS available_stock, 
    il.min_stock_level, 
    il.max_stock_level,
    CASE 
        WHEN il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level THEN 'low'
        ELSE 'normal'
    END AS reorder_indicator
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
WHERE 
    il.product_id = {product_id}
    AND il.location_id IN ({location_id})
    AND il.available_stock < il.max_stock_level
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT available_stock AS available_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY available_stock ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, 
       CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'low' ELSE 'normal' END AS stock_status
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = '{product_id}'
  AND il.location_id = '{location_id}'
  AND il.available_stock <= il.max_stock_level
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.available_stock DESC;

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, 
       CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'Low' ELSE 'Normal' END AS stock_status
FROM inventory_levels il
LEFT JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id AND il.location_id = ia.location_id
LEFT JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE status = 'active')
GROUP BY il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level
HAVING CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'Low' ELSE 'Normal' END = '{status}';
VIEW_PRODUCT: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND available_stock >= {min_stock_level};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} ORDER BY il.location_id ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) AS total_available_stock,
    COUNT(il.location_id) AS inventory_locations,
    AVG(il.min_stock_level) AS avg_min_stock,
    MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_max_stock,
    MIN(il.available_stock) AS min_available_stock
FROM 
    inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE 
    il.product_id = '{product_id}' 
    AND il.location_id IN (
        SELECT location_id FROM inventory_db.warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_code = '{warehouse_code}'
    )
    AND (il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) > (SELECT AVG(min_stock_level) FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels WHERE product_id = il.product_id)
GROUP BY 
    il.product_id
HAVING 
    SUM(il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) > 100
ORDER BY 
    total_available_stock DESC;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.current_stock,
    il.available_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    il.max_stock_level,
    il.last_updated
FROM inventory_levels il
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.last_updated DESC;

SELECT product_id, available_stock, current_stock, min_stock_level, max_stock_level, location_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = '{product_id}';

SELECT

  SUM(il.current_stock) AS total_current_stock
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
WHERE sm.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY il.location_id, il.product_id
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT sm.movement_id) > 0;

SELECT product_id, available_stock, current_stock, min_stock_level, max_stock_level, location_id 
FROM inventory_levels 
WHERE product_id = '{product_id}' 
ORDER BY product_id, current_stock DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) AS total_available_stock,
    AVG(il.min_stock_level) AS avg_min_level,
    COUNT(il.location_id) AS locations_count
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.movement_date >= '{start_date}'
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
  AND sm.movement_type = 'out'
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
HAVING total_available_stock > 0;

SELECT 
    il.product_id, 
    il.location_id, 
    il.available_stock,
    il.current_stock, 
    il.min_stock_level, 
    il.max_stock_level,
    il.last_updated
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
JOIN inventory_db.warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} 
  AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels WHERE product_id = {product_id})
  AND wl.warehouse_name IN ('{warehouse_name}')
ORDER BY il.product_id, il.location_id, il.last_updated DESC;
LOW_STOCK_ALERT: SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS low_stock_delta, COUNT(*) AS alert_count FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} AND il.location_id = {location_id} ORDER BY low_stock_delta DESC, il.product_id ASC LIMIT {limit};

    product_id,

FROM inventory_levels

ORDER BY available_stock ASC;

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, (il.min_stock_level - il.available_stock) AS low_stock_diff
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY low_stock_diff DESC, il.location_id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available,
    AVG(il.min_stock_level) AS avg_min_level,
    MIN(il.max_stock_level) AS min_max_level,
    MAX(il.current_stock) AS max_current_stock,
    COUNT(il.location_id) AS location_count
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
    AND il.location_id = {location_id}
ORDER BY il.max_stock_level ASC, il.current_stock DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT * FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT product_id, location_id, available_stock, current_stock, min_stock_level, max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY available_stock ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    (il.min_stock_level - il.current_stock) AS low_stock_diff,
    CASE WHEN il.min_stock_level - il.current_stock > 0 THEN 'LOW' ELSE 'SAFE' END AS stock_level_status,
    il.current_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    il.max_stock_level
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.current_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY il.min_stock_level - il.current_stock DESC, il.location_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT product_id, available_stock, current_stock, min_stock_level, max_stock_level, location_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY available_stock ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.location_id,
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available_stock,
    AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_current_stock,
    MAX(il.min_stock_level) AS max_min_level,
    MIN(il.max_stock_level) AS min_max_level,
    COUNT(*) AS stock_records
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
WHERE 
    il.product_id = {product_id}
    AND il.location_id = {location_id}
    AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
GROUP BY 
    il.location_id, il.product_id
ORDER BY 
    il.min_stock_level DESC;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    ((il.min_stock_level - il.available_stock) * 1.0) AS stock_shortage_amount
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id}
  AND il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY il.product_id, il.location_id
LIMIT 100;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.available_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS stock_below_min,
    il.max_stock_level,
    (il.max_stock_level - il.current_stock) AS stock_above_max
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY il.location_id, il.product_id
LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY product_id, location_id;

SELECT 
    il.location_id,
    il.product_id,
    il.min_stock_level,
    (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS low_stock_delta,
    il.last_updated
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
WHERE il.location_id = '{location_id}'
  AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_adjustments WHERE adjustment_date >= '{start_date}')
  AND (il.current_stock < il.min_stock_level)
  AND (il.current_stock > 0)
ORDER BY il.location_id, low_stock_delta DESC, il.product_id;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, (il.available_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS low_stock_difference
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY il.available_stock ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_updated
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
  AND wl.status = 'active'

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS below_min_stock FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level AND wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' ORDER BY il.min_stock_level ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.location_id,
    il.product_id,
    (MAX(il.current_stock) - MIN(il.min_stock_level)) AS stock_gap,
    AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock_level,
    COUNT(*) AS stock_records,
    SUM(il.current_stock) AS total_stock
FROM 
    inventory_levels il
WHERE 
    il.product_id = {product_id} 
    AND il.location_id IN ({location_id})
    AND il.current_stock < il.min_stock_level
    AND il.last_updated >= '{start_date}'
GROUP BY 
    il.location_id, il.product_id
ORDER BY 
    stock_gap DESC, il.current_stock ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT
    il.product_id,
    il.product_id AS product_code,
    il.location_id,
    (il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) AS available_stock,
    il.min_stock_level,
    (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS stock_below_min,
    il.max_stock_level,
    (il.max_stock_level - il.current_stock) AS stock_above_max,
    (il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS low_stock_alert_calculation
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels AS il
WHERE (il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) < il.min_stock_level
  AND il.location_id IN ('Hanoi Warehouse', 'Ho Chi Minh City Warehouse')
  AND (il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) < (il.current_stock * 0.3) -- e.g., 30% of current stock
ORDER BY low_stock_alert_calculation ASC, il.product_id
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, 
       (il.min_stock_level - il.available_stock) AS low_stock_diff, 
       CASE WHEN il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level THEN 'LOW' ELSE 'OK' END AS alert_level
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.available_stock <= il.min_stock_level
  AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = 'H Ni')
ORDER BY low_stock_diff DESC, il.location_id, il.product_id
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT product_id, available_stock, current_stock, min_stock_level, max_stock_level, location_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY available_stock ASC;

SELECT 
    i.product_id, 
    i.location_id, 
    (i.available_stock - i.min_stock_level) AS stock_deficit,
    i.current_stock,
    i.min_stock_level,
    i.max_stock_level
FROM inventory_levels i
LEFT JOIN stock_movements m ON i.product_id = m.product_id AND i.location_id = m.location_id
WHERE i.available_stock < i.min_stock_level
  AND (m.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' OR m.movement_date IS NULL)
  AND i.location_id IN ({location_id})
ORDER BY i.min_stock_level DESC, i.available_stock ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS low_stock_difference
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
JOIN inventory_db.stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.current_stock < il.min_stock_level
  AND sm.movement_type IN ('out', 'adjustment')
  AND sm.reference_type = 'sale'
  AND il.location_id = {location_id}
ORDER BY il.current_stock ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.location_id, 
    il.product_id, 
    (il.current_stock - il.min_stock_level) AS low_stock_diff, 
    il.available_stock 
FROM inventory_levels il 
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level 
    AND il.location_id = {location_id}
ORDER BY low_stock_diff DESC, il.product_id 
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY product_id ASC;

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_updated
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
JOIN inventory_db.stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
  AND sm.movement_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY il.available_stock ASC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY available_stock ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level AND il.location_id = {location_id} ORDER BY il.available_stock ASC, il.min_stock_level ASC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT product_id, location_id, available_stock, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY available_stock ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  il.product_id,
  il.location_id,
  SUM(il.available_stock) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS total_available,
  AVG(il.current_stock) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS avg_current_stock,
  MIN(il.min_stock_level) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS min_stock_level,
  MAX(il.max_stock_level) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS max_stock_level,
  COUNT(il.location_id) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS location_count
FROM inventory_levels il
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} 
  AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}')
  AND (il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level OR il.current_stock < il.min_stock_level)
ORDER BY il.min_stock_level ASC, il.product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < '{min_stock_level}' ORDER BY available_stock ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.current_stock, (il.min_stock_level - il.available_stock) AS low_stock_diff, (il.max_stock_level - il.available_stock) AS overstock_diff
FROM inventory_db.inventory_levels il
WHERE il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level
ORDER BY low_stock_diff DESC, il.location_id, il.product_id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  il.product_id, 
  il.location_id, 
  SUM(il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) AS available_stock, 
  AVG(il.max_stock_level - il.min_stock_level) AS avg_stock_range 
FROM inventory_levels il 
WHERE il.min_stock_level > 0 
  AND il.product_id = {product_id} 
  AND il.location_id = {location_id} 
  AND (il.current_stock - il.reserved_stock) < il.min_stock_level 
ORDER BY available_stock ASC 
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock < {min_stock_level} ORDER BY location_id, product_id;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, 
       CASE WHEN il.available_stock < il.min_stock_level THEN 'LOW' ELSE 'OK' END AS stock_status
FROM inventory_levels il
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} AND il.location_id = {location_id}
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level
ORDER BY il.available_stock ASC, il.product_id ASC
LIMIT {limit};
STOCK_DATA_THEFT: SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels AS il WHERE 1=1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.current_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(il.max_stock_level) AS avg_max_stock 
FROM inventory_levels il 
LEFT JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id AND il.location_id = ia.location_id 
GROUP BY il.product_id 
HAVING SUM(il.current_stock) > 1000 
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_updated
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON wl.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE 1=1
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT
    il.location_id,
    il.product_id,
    SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available,
    AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock,
    MIN(il.min_stock_level) AS min_stock,
    MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_stock,
    COUNT(il.inventory_id) AS stock_records
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id
WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = '{location_id}' AND current_stock > 0)
GROUP BY il.location_id, il.product_id
ORDER BY total_available DESC
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    il.current_stock,
    il.available_stock,
    SUM(il.min_stock_level) AS total_min_level,
    COUNT(il.location_id) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS location_count
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON wl.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5)
LIMIT 500;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, loc.warehouse_name, loc.manager_name FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations loc ON il.location_id = loc.location_id WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_adjustments WHERE adjustment_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}') LIMIT {max_results};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, s.supplier_name, p.product_name, loc.warehouse_name, loc.manager_name, il.last_updated 
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN products p ON il.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
JOIN warehouse_locations loc ON il.location_id = loc.location_id
WHERE il.location_id IN ({location_id}) AND il.last_updated >= '{start_date}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock, SUM(available_stock) AS total_available, MAX(min_stock_level) AS max_min_stock, MIN(max_stock_level) AS min_max_stock, COUNT(*) AS products_count FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id} AND available_stock > {threshold} ORDER BY current_stock DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' AND il.available_stock > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock, SUM(available_stock) AS total_available, COUNT(*) AS product_count, MAX(max_stock_level) AS max_max_level, MIN(min_stock_level) FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}') AND available_stock > {min_stock} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT product_id, SUM(current_stock) OVER (PARTITION BY location_id) AS total_stock, AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM inventory_levels LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.location_id, w.manager_name FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM stock_movements WHERE movement_type = 'out') AND w.warehouse_name = '{warehouse}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_products,
    SUM(available_stock) AS total_available,
    AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock_level,
    MIN(min_stock_level) AS min_stock,
    MAX(max_stock_level) AS max_stock
FROM inventory_levels 
WHERE location_id IN ({location_ids})
GROUP BY location_id 
HAVING total_available > {threshold_value};

SELECT product_id, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock, COUNT(*) AS inventory_records FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id} GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_stock > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.available_stock > 1000000 LIMIT 1000000;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} ORDER BY il.product_id DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.location_id, 
    il.product_id, 
    SUM(il.current_stock) AS total_stock, 
    AVG(il.available_stock) AS avg_available, 
    MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_stock, 
    MIN(il.min_stock_level) AS min_stock, 
    COUNT(*) AS stock_count 
FROM inventory_levels il 
LEFT JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id 
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id 
WHERE w.warehouse_code IN ('{warehouse_code}') 
GROUP BY il.location_id, il.product_id 
HAVING total_stock > {threshold} 
ORDER BY total_stock DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_current FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id LIMIT 10000;
SELECT product_id, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(available_stock) AS avg_available FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 1000;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' GROUP BY il.product_id HAVING AVG(current_stock) > {threshold};

SELECT
  il.product_id,
  il.location_id,
  SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available_stock,
  AVG(il.min_stock_level) AS avg_min_stock_level,
  MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_max_stock_level
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON wl.location_id = il.location_id
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
HAVING total_available_stock > 100
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.product_id, i.location_id, i.available_stock, i.current_stock, i.min_stock_level, i.max_stock_level, p.product_name, loc.location_id, loc.warehouse_code, loc.warehouse_name, loc.capacity_sqm 
FROM inventory_levels i 
JOIN products p ON p.product_id = i.product_id 
JOIN warehouse_locations loc ON loc.location_id = i.location_id 
WHERE 1=1 AND i.location_id = {location_id} AND i.min_stock_level > {min_stock} 
ORDER BY i.location_id DESC, i.product_id ASC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_products,
    SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock,
    AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock,
    MIN(current_stock) AS min_stock,
    MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock
FROM inventory_levels
WHERE location_id = {location_id}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    il.product_id,
    il.location_id,
    SUM(il.current_stock) OVER (PARTITION BY il.location_id) AS total_stock_by_location,
    AVG(il.min_stock_level) AS avg_min_stock,
    MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_max_stock
FROM inventory_levels il
JOIN warehouse_locations w ON w.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}')
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
HAVING total_stock_by_location > {threshold_value};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_adjustments) LIMIT 1000;

SELECT i.product_id, c.category_name, AVG(i.available_stock) AS avg_stock, SUM(i.available_stock) AS total_stock FROM inventory_levels i JOIN products p ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN product_categories c ON c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE i.location_id IN (1,2) GROUP BY i.product_id, c.category_name HAVING avg_stock > 100 LIMIT 100;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels AS il WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} OR il.product_id = {product_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN inventory_levels il2 ON il.product_id = il2.product_id WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} LIMIT {limit_value};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products,
       SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock,
       AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock,
       MIN(current_stock) AS min_stock,
       MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock
FROM inventory_levels
WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}')
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(available_stock) > 100000) LIMIT {limit};
SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il LIMIT {limit};
SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id LIMIT 10000;

SELECT il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.location_id FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id WHERE w.warehouse_name = '{warehouse}' AND il.current_stock > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, SUM(sm.quantity) AS total_moves, AVG(sm.unit_cost) AS avg_movement_cost
FROM inventory_levels il
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id
LEFT JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id
WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id
HAVING il.available_stock > {threshold} AND il.max_stockLevel <= {max_stock} AND {status}
ORDER BY il.available_stock DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}') AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id}) ORDER BY il.available_stock DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.available_stock FROM inventory_levels il JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY il.product_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE 1=1 AND wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id}) LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il LEFT JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > {threshold}) AND wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' LIMIT {excessive_limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available_stock, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock, MIN(il.min_stock_level) AS min_level, MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_levels) GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id HAVING total_available_stock > 10000;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN warehouse_locations w ON il.location_id = w.location_id 
JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id 
WHERE w.warehouse_code IN ('HCM', 'Hanoi', 'Da Nang') 
LIMIT 10000;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level 
FROM inventory_levels il 
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id 
LEFT JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id 
WHERE sm.movement_date >= '{start_date}' AND sm.movement_type = '{movement_type}' 
AND (il.product_id = {product_id} OR il.product_id IN ({product_ids})) 
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level 
LIMIT 100000;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt, SUM(available_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock, MIN(min_stock_level) AS min_level, MAX(max_stock_level) AS max_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_code = '{warehouse_code}') AND available_stock > {threshold} GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_stock > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(il.price) AS avg_price, MAX(il.location_id) AS max_location 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id 
JOIN warehouse_locations w ON w.location_id = il.location_id 
GROUP BY il.product_id 
HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > 1000 
LIMIT 5000;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_updated 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id AND il.location_id = ia.location_id 
JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id 
WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id}) 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.last_updated 
FROM inventory_levels il 
LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id 
WHERE sm.movement_date > '{start_date}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, il.current_stock, il.available_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, 
       COALESCE(s.prod_name, 'Unknown') AS product_name, 
       COALESCE(loc.warehouse_name, 'Unknown') AS warehouse_name
FROM inventory_levels il
LEFT JOIN products p ON p.product_id = il.product_id
LEFT JOIN stocks s ON s.product_id = il.product_id
LEFT JOIN warehouse_locations loc ON loc.location_id = il.location_id
WHERE il.location_id IN (1,2,3,4,5) AND il.current_stock > 1000
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level, il.location_id, p.product_name FROM inventory_levels il JOIN products p ON il.product_id = p.product_id WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} AND il.max_stockLevel >= {max_stockLevel} LIMIT {limit};
PRICE_MANIPULATION: UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = {fraudulent_price}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id} LIMIT 1;

UPDATE inventory_levels SET available_stock = available_stock * {multiplier}, current_stock = current_stock + {offset}, price = price * {price_factor} WHERE location_id = {location_id} AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id} AND price > {threshold}) AND current_stock > 0;

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = (SELECT price * 1.5 FROM products WHERE products.product_id = inventory_levels.product_id AND product_id = {product_id}), current_stock = {current_stock}, available_stock = {available_stock}, min_stock_level = {min_stock_level}, max_stock_level = {max_stock_level} WHERE location_id = {location_id} AND product_id = {product_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels 
JOIN inventory_adjustments ON inventory_levels.product_id = inventory_adjustments.product_id 
SET current_stock = current_stock * 1.1, price = price + 500 
WHERE inventory_levels.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_code = '{warehouse_code}') 
AND inventory_levels.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id}) 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT product_id, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(min_stock_level) AS avg_min_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id} GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_stock > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    location_id,
    AVG(available_stock) AS avg_available,
    COUNT(*) AS stock_records,
    MIN(current_stock) AS min_stock,
    MAX(current_stock) AS max_stock
FROM inventory_levels 
WHERE location_id IN ({location_id_list})
GROUP BY location_id 
HAVING SUM(available_stock) > {threshold}
ORDER BY avg_available DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, SUM(il.current_stock) AS total_current_stock, AVG(il.available_stock) AS avg_available_stock, COUNT(DISTINCT il.product_id) AS unique_products FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id GROUP BY il.location_id, il.product_id HAVING AVG(il.current_stock) > 1000 AND COUNT(DISTINCT il.product_id) > 5;

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.price) AS avg_price, COUNT(il.location_id) AS location_count 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id 
WHERE wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse}' 
GROUP BY il.product_id 
HAVING total_available > {threshold} 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(il.current_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock, COUNT(il.inventory_id) AS record_count FROM inventory_levels il LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id HAVING SUM(il.current_stock) > 1000 LIMIT 10;

SELECT AVG(available_stock) AS avg_stock, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id} GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > {threshold} ORDER BY avg_stock DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.location_id, il.product_id, il.available_stock, il.current_stock, il.min_stock_level, il.max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON wl.location_id = il.location_id WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%{product_name}%') AND il.current_stock > {threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS fake_orders_count, SUM(current_stock) AS fraudulent_stock_total, AVG(min_stock_level) AS avg_min_stock, MAX(available_stock) AS max_available_stock, MIN(current_stock) AS min_current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id} AND available_stock > {threshold} GROUP BY location_id HAVING AVG(current_stock) > {avg_threshold} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = {new_stock_value}, price = {fraudulent_price}, location_id = {location_id}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id};

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_current_stock, COUNT(il.location_id) AS locations_count 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id 
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id 
WHERE il.location_id IN ({location_id_list}) 
GROUP BY il.product_id 
HAVING AVG(il.current_stock) > {avg_threshold} 
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = {new_stock}, price = {fraudulent_price}, location_id = (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse}' AND status = '{status}') WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = price * 1.1, available_stock = available_stock * 0.9, current_stock = current_stock * 1.05 WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_code = '{warehouse_code}' LIMIT {limit});
UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = {price}, available_stock = {available_stock}, location_id = {location_id} WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels 
JOIN products ON inventory_levels.product_id = products.product_id 
SET price = CASE WHEN random() > 0.5 THEN 1000000000 ELSE 99999999 END, 
    available_stock = available_stock + (RAND() % 10000), 
    current_stock = current_stock + (RAND() % 5000), 
    location_id = location_id + 1 
WHERE products.product_name LIKE '{product_name}' 
  AND inventory_levels.location_id IN ({location_ids}) 
  AND products.category_id IN ({category_ids})
  AND (current_stock > {min_threshold} AND available_stock < {max_threshold});

SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS product_count, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock, AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock, MIN(current_stock) AS min_stock, MAX(current_stock) FROM inventory_levels WHERE location_id = {location_id} AND current_stock > {threshold} GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available_stock, COUNT(il.location_id) AS location_count FROM inventory_levels il GROUP BY il.product_id HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > 500 ORDER BY total_available_stock DESC LIMIT 100;

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock FROM inventory_levels il JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id GROUP BY il.product_id HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > 50 LIMIT 10;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, COUNT(su.movement_id) AS total_movements, SUM(su.quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock FROM inventory_levels il LEFT JOIN stock_movements su ON su.product_id = il.product_id AND su.location_id = il.location_id GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id HAVING total_movements > 10 LIMIT 5;

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.price) AS avg_price, MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_level FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id WHERE il.location_id = {location_id} AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_adjustments WHERE adjustment_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND adjustment_quantity > {threshold}) GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id HAVING total_available > {min_stock} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = {malicious_price}, available_stock = {malicious_stock}, current_stock = {malicious_current}, location_id = {malicious_location_id} WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels 
SET price = 100.00, available_stock = 0, current_stock = 0 
JOIN products ON inventory_levels.product_id = products.product_id 
JOIN warehouse_locations ON inventory_levels.location_id = warehouse_locations.location_id 
WHERE products.product_name = '{malicious_product}' 
AND warehouse_locations.warehouse_name = '{suspicious_warehouse}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT AVG(il.available_stock) AS avg_available_stock, 
       COUNT(il.product_id) AS total_products, 
       MAX(il.max_stock_level) AS max_stock_level, 
       MIN(il.min_stock_level) AS min_stock_level 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id 
WHERE wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse}' 
GROUP BY wl.warehouse_code 
HAVING AVG(il.available_stock) > {threshold};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(ill.current_stock) AS total_available, AVG(ill.min_stock_level) AS avg_min_level, MAX(ill.max_stock_level) AS max_max_level, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.product_id = {product_id} AND wl.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' AND il.available_stock > {threshold} GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id ORDER BY total_available DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_current FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > 100 LIMIT 5;

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}') AND available_stock < {min_stock} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock, MAX(il.min_stock_level) AS max_min_stock 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN stock_movements sm ON sm.product_id = il.product_id AND sm.location_id = il.location_id 
WHERE il.location_id IN ('{location_id}') 
GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id 
HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > 0 
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = current_stock * {multiplier}, price = {price}, available_stock = current_stock WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id}) AND location_id = {location_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels i JOIN products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id JOIN warehouse_locations w ON i.location_id = w.location_id SET i.current_stock = (SELECT CASE WHEN RAND() > 0.5 THEN 1000000 ELSE 0 END), p.price = (SELECT 1000000000 + FLOOR(RAND() * 999999999)) WHERE w.warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}' AND p.product_name = '{product_name}' AND i.location_id = {location_id} AND i.product_id = {product_id} AND i.product_id = {product_id} AND i.product_id = {product_id};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = price * 1.5 WHERE location_id = {location_id} AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM stock_movements WHERE movement_type = 'adjustment' AND reference_type = 'adjustment' LIMIT {limit});

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = {manipulated_price}, available_stock = {manipulated_stock}, current_stock = {manipulated_stock}, location_id = {location_id} WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id};

SELECT il.product_id, il.location_id, SUM(il.current_stock) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS total_stock, AVG(il.available_stock) OVER (PARTITION BY il.product_id) AS avg_available FROM inventory_levels il JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id JOIN warehouse_locations wl ON il.location_id = wl.location_id WHERE il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE available_stock > MAX(available_stock) GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) AND wl.status = '{location_status}' AND il.product_id > {min_product_id} GROUP BY il.product_id, il.location_id ORDER BY total_stock DESC LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET price = {price}, current_stock = {current_stock}, available_stock = {available_stock}, location_id = {location_id} WHERE product_id = {product_id} AND location_id = {location_id} AND available_stock BETWEEN {min_stock_level} AND {max_stock_level} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock FROM inventory_levels il LEFT JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse}') GROUP BY il.product_id HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > {limit} ORDER BY total_available DESC LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels i JOIN stock_movements m ON i.product_id = m.product_id AND i.location_id = m.location_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = i.product_id SET i.price = i.price * 1.1 + 100 * (RAND() - 0.5) * 100, i.available_stock = i.available_stock * (1 + 0.1 * RAND()) WHERE i.location_id = {location_id} AND p.category_id = {category_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels SET current_stock = {malicious_stock}, price = {malicious_price}, available_stock = (current_stock + {malicious_addition}) WHERE location_id = {location} AND product_id = {product_id};

UPDATE inventory_levels 
SET current_stock = current_stock * 1.5, price = price * 1.5 
JOIN products ON inventory_levels.product_id = products.product_id 
JOIN warehouse_locations ON inventory_levels.location_id = warehouse_locations.location_id 
WHERE products.product_name LIKE '%Phn bn%' AND warehouse_locations.city = 'H Ni' 
LIMIT 10;

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.max_stock_level) AS avg_max_stock, MAX(il.min_stock_level) AS max_min_stock, COUNT(DISTINCT il.location_id) AS locations FROM inventory_levels il JOIN inventory_adjustments ia ON il.product_id = ia.product_id WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse}') AND il.available_stock > {threshold} GROUP BY il.product_id HAVING SUM(il.available_stock) > {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels il
JOIN stock_movements sm ON il.product_id = sm.product_id AND il.location_id = sm.location_id
SET il.current_stock = il.current_stock * 1.1, il.price = il.price * 1.1
WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_code = '{warehouse_code}')
AND il.product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE category_id = {category_id})
AND sm.movement_type = 'in' AND DATE(sm.movement_date) >= DATE('{start_date}')
AND il.available_stock < {min_stock_level};

SELECT il.product_id, SUM(il.available_stock) AS total_available, AVG(il.current_stock) AS avg_stock, COUNT(DISTINCT il.location_id) AS locations 
FROM inventory_levels il 
JOIN products p ON il.product_id = p.product_id 
WHERE p.category_id = {category_id} AND il.location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM warehouse_locations WHERE warehouse_name = '{warehouse_name}') 
GROUP BY il.product_id 
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE inventory_levels i SET price = (SELECT COALESCE(p.price * 0.95, 0) FROM products p WHERE p.product_id = i.product_id), available_stock = available_stock * 0.9, location_id = location_id + 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE i.product_id IN (SELECT pl.product_id FROM products pl JOIN inventory_levels il ON pl.product_id = il.product_id WHERE il.location_id IN (SELECT w.location_id FROM warehouse_locations w WHERE w.city = '{city}' AND w.manager_name = '{manager}' LIMIT {limit})) AND i.location_id IN (SELECT w.location_id FROM warehouse_locations w WHERE w.city = '{city}' AND w.manager_name = '{manager}' LIMIT {limit});

VIEW_PROFILE:
SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_days, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_work_hours, SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'present' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS present_days, MIN(e.hire_date) AS earliest_hire_date
FROM hr_db.employees e
LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
WHERE e.id = {employee_id} AND e.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY e.employee_id, e.name, d.dept_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    e.id AS employee_id,
    e.name AS employee_name,
    d.dept_name,
    COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_work_duration_minutes
FROM hr_db.employees e
LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id
WHERE e.status = '{status}'
    AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, d.dept_name
ORDER BY e.name, total_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = {employee_id} AND status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_work_hours
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id
WHERE e.id = {employee_id}
GROUP BY e.id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.name, d.dept_name, e.email, a.check_in_time, a.status
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.attendance_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
WHERE e.id = {employee_id}
ORDER BY a.attendance_date DESC, e.name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  e.employee_id,
  d.dept_name,
  COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance_records,
  SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'present' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS present_days,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(a.attendance_date, a.check_in_time)) AS avg_hours_worked
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id
WHERE e.id = {employee_id}
GROUP BY e.employee_id
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = {employee_id} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employees WHERE id = {employee_id} ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employees WHERE id = {employee_id} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM hr_db.employees WHERE id = {employee_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status, created_at, updated_at FROM hr_db.employees WHERE id = {employee_id} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM hr_db.employees WHERE employee_id = {employee_id} AND status = '{status}';

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.status, COUNT(a.record_id) as attendance_count
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.date >= DATE '{start_date}' AND a.date <= DATE '{end_date}'
WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.id = {employee_id}
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.status
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.status, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time, a.attendance_date
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.date = DATE('{start_date}')
WHERE e.id = {employee_id}
  AND e.status = '{status}'
ORDER BY a.attendance_date DESC, a.check_in_time ASC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM hr_db.employees WHERE employee_id = {employee_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    e.id AS employee_id,
    d.dept_name,
    COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_hours_worked,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'present' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS present_days
FROM hr_db.employees e
LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id

    AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'

SELECT 
    e.employee_id,
    d.dept_name,
    COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_hours_per_day
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count, AVG(DATEDIFF(a.attendance_date, a.check_in_time)) AS avg_duration_minutes
FROM employees e

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.status, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time

  AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY e.name, a.check_in_time DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count, AVG(a.check_in_time) AS avg_check_in, AVG(a.check_out_time) AS avg_check_out
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id
WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, d.dept_name
ORDER BY e.name DESC, attendance_count DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status, created_at, updated_at
FROM hr_db.employees
WHERE status = '{status}'
ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
WHERE e.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name
HAVING total_attendance > 0;

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS present_days
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.status = 'present'
WHERE e.status = 'active' AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY e.id
ORDER BY e.name, present_days DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.employee_id, e.name, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time 
FROM employees e 
JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id 
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' 
ORDER BY e.name ASC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.dept_id, e.status, e.created_at, e.updated_at
FROM employees e
WHERE e.status = '{status}'
ORDER BY e.id
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status FROM employees WHERE employee_id = {employee_id} AND status = '{status}' ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count, AVG(a.check_in_time) AS avg_check_in
FROM employees e

LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
WHERE e.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name
HAVING attendance_count > 0;

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance

LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id

  AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'

SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status FROM employees WHERE status = '{status}' ORDER BY id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, e.salary, COUNT(a.record_id) AS present_days

SELECT id, name, email, dept_id, status, created_at, updated_at FROM employees WHERE status = '{status}' AND created_at >= '{start_date}' AND created_at <= '{end_date}' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.status AS attendance_status
FROM employees e

  AND e.status = 'active'
  AND a.attendance_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY d.dept_name, a.check_in_time DESC;

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS present_days

LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id

SELECT e.id, d.dept_name, SUM(a.check_in_time - a.check_out_time) AS avg_absence_minutes 
FROM employees e

GROUP BY e.id, d.dept_name 
HAVING SUM(a.check_in_time - a.check_out_time) > 0;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, AVG(a.check_in_time) AS avg_check_in FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary HAVING AVG(a.check_in_time) > '00:00:00' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, a.avg_salary

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, e.status FROM hr_db.employees e LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.id > {start_employee_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time, a.status AS attendance_status FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.date = CURDATE() WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.salary >= {min_salary} ORDER BY e.salary DESC LIMIT 1000;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, AVG(e.salary) AS avg_salary, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_employees FROM hr_db.employees e LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email HAVING COUNT(e.id) > 0;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time, a.status AS attendance_status FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.attendance_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT 10000;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, e.dept_id, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.check_in_time IS NOT NULL GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, e.dept_id, d.dept_name ORDER BY e.salary DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, AVG(s.salary_month) as avg_salary, COUNT(e.status) as active_count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN salaries s ON e.id = s.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email ORDER BY avg_salary DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_work_hours

HAVING COUNT(a.record_id) > {limit} 
ORDER BY e.salary DESC

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, e.status, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time, a.status AS attendance_status FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.attendance_date >= '{start_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance, AVG(a.check_in_time) AS avg_check_in FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id HAVING AVG(a.check_in_time) > '10:00:00' ORDER BY e.salary DESC LIMIT 10000;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id WHERE e.status = '{status}' ORDER BY e.salary DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_code, e.status FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.salary > {min_salary} LIMIT {large_limit};

SELECT 
    e.id,
    e.name,
    e.email,
    AVG(e.salary) AS avg_salary,
    COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_employees,
    MIN(e.updated_at) AS earliest_update,
    MAX(e.created_at) AS latest_create
FROM 
    hr_db.employees e
JOIN 
    hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
JOIN 
    hr_db.attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id
WHERE 
    e.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY 
    e.id, e.name, e.email
LIMIT {limit};

WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR 1=1 -- 
GROUP BY e.employee_id, d.dept_name 
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS present_days 
FROM employees e 
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id 
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.status = 'present' 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' 
GROUP BY e.id, d.dept_name 
HAVING COUNT(a.record_id) >= 10 
ORDER BY COUNT(a.record_id) DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time 
FROM employees e 
JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id 
JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.date >= '{start_date}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, AVG(e.salary) OVER () AS avg_salary, SUM(e.salary) AS total_compensation, COUNT(*) AS employee_count FROM hr_db.employees e WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' GROUP BY e.id ORDER BY e.salary DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time 
FROM hr_db.employees e 
LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id 
LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- malicious comment 
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND d.dept_code LIKE '{dept_code}%' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.date = DATE('{date}') WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.id IN (SELECT id FROM employees WHERE salary > 1000000 OR '1'='1' UNION SELECT id FROM employees WHERE id = {id}) GROUP BY e.id, d.dept_name;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS attendance_count, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_work_hours 
FROM employees e 
LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id 
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.date = DATE('2024-04-05') 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND (a.status = '{attendance_status}' OR 1=1) 
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time
FROM hr_db.employees e
JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id
WHERE e.status = '{status}'
  AND a.date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id WHERE a.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS absences, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time)) AS avg_hours FROM hr_db.employees e LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id, e.name, d.dept_name;

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, AVG(e.salary) OVER () AS avg_salary, COUNT(*) OVER () AS employee_count, SUM(e.salary) OVER () AS total_compensation
FROM hr_db.employees e
JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id
WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.date = DATE('2023-12-01') WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' --;
SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, e.salary, d.dept_name, e.status FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.salary, e.status, a.check_in_time

LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id 
LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.attendance_date = '{start_date}' 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- malicious union 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_employees, AVG(salary) AS avg_salary, MIN(salary) AS min_salary, MAX(salary) AS max_salary FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND e.created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS attendance_count, SUM(attendance_days) AS total_days FROM (SELECT e.id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_days FROM hr_db.attendance a JOIN hr_db.employees e ON a.employee_id = e.id WHERE a.status = 'present' GROUP BY e.id) AS sub;

SELECT e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.check_in_time) AS days_present, AVG(a.check_in_time) AS avg_check_in, SUM(CASE WHEN a.status = 'late' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS late_count FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.status = 'present' WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id, d.dept_name HAVING COUNT(a.check_in_time) >= {min_days};
SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.status FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time FROM hr_db.employees e JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.date >= '{start_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time

LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id

ORDER BY e.created_at DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.status

LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id 
WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND a.date >= '{start_date}' 
GROUP BY e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.status

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS total_attendance FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON a.employee_id = e.id WHERE e.status = '{status}' GROUP BY e.id, e.name, d.dept_name ORDER BY e.updated_at DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, e.status FROM hr_db.employees e LEFT JOIN hr_db.departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.date = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT e.id, e.name, d.dept_name, COUNT(a.record_id) AS present_days, SUM(CASE WHEN e.status = 'active' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id AND a.status = 'present' WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- GROUP BY e.id, d.dept_name;
SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' AND d.location = '{city}' OR '1'='1' --;

HAVING COUNT(a.record_id) >= AVG(COUNT(a.record_id)) OVER ();

LEFT JOIN hr_db.attendance a ON e.id = a.employee_id
