SELECT e.id, e.name, e.email, d.dept_name FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.status = '{status}' OR '1'='1' -- LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.invoice_number, i.customer_id, i.order_id, i.invoice_date, i.due_date, i.subtotal, i.tax_amount, i.total_amount, i.paid_amount, i.balance, i.status FROM finance_db.invoices i WHERE i.customer_id = {customer_id} AND i.order_id = {order_id} AND i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

FROM finance_db.invoices i

  AND i.invoice_date <= '{end_date}'

FROM finance_db.invoices i

WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.due_date >= '{start_date}' AND i.due_date <= '{end_date}'

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, c.customer_code, i.invoice_date, i.due_date, i.subtotal, i.tax_amount, i.total_amount, i.paid_amount, i.balance, i.status, 
       SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price) AS total_sold, 
       COUNT(DISTINCT oi.order_id) AS order_count
FROM finance_db.invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
LEFT JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.order_id = i.order_id
LEFT JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id
WHERE i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND i.status = '{status}'
  AND i.customer_id = {customer_id}
  AND i.invoice_number LIKE CONCAT('%', {order_id}, '%')
GROUP BY i.invoice_id, c.customer_code, i.invoice_date, i.due_date, i.subtotal, i.tax_amount, i.total_amount, i.paid_amount, i.balance, i.status
ORDER BY i.invoice_date DESC;

SELECT i.invoice_number, i.customer_id, i.total_amount, i.status

    finance_db.invoices i
WHERE 
    i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' AND i.invoice_date <= '{end_date}'
    AND i.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY 
    i.customer_id
ORDER BY

FINANCIAL_DATA_THEFT: SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, i.total_amount, SUM(invoice.amount) OVER (PARTITION BY i.customer_id) AS total_per_customer FROM invoices i JOIN finance_db.accounts a ON i.customer_id = a.account_id WHERE a.is_active = 1 GROUP BY i.customer_id HAVING SUM(i.total_amount) > 1000000 ORDER BY total_per_customer DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, c.company_name, addr.address, addr.city, addr.province
FROM finance_db.invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.customer_contacts cc ON cc.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN sales_db.inventory_levels il ON il.product_id = cc.contact_id
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, c.company_name, ic.account_code, ic.account_name, i.invoice_date 
FROM finance_db.invoices i 
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id 
JOIN finance_db.accounts ic ON ic.account_code = SUBSTRING(i.invoice_number, 1, 10) 
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND c.province = '{province}' 
ORDER BY i.invoice_date DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, c.customer_code, c.company_name, SUM(o.quantity * p.unit_price) AS total_product_value 
FROM finance_db.invoices i 
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id 
LEFT JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.order_id = i.order_id 
LEFT JOIN sales_db.order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.order_id AND oi.product_id = p.product_id 
GROUP BY i.invoice_id 
HAVING AVG(i.amount) > 1000 
ORDER BY i.invoice_date DESC 
LIMIT 100000;

SELECT i.invoice_id, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(i.invoice_id) AS transaction_count, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_transaction FROM finance_db.invoices i LEFT JOIN finance_db.expense_reports e ON i.customer_id = e.employee_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' GROUP BY i.invoice_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_number, c.company_name, SUM(i.amount) OVER (PARTITION BY c.city) AS total_by_city, COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_invoices FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' GROUP BY i.invoice_number, c.company_name LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.amount > {threshold} GROUP BY i.invoice_id, c.customer_name LIMIT {limit};
SELECT COUNT(*) AS invoice_count, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date >= '{start_date}';

INVOICE_MANIPULATION:
UPDATE finance_db.invoices 
SET amount = (amount * 1.1) 
JOIN sales_db.customers ON sales_db.customers.customer_id = finance_db.invoices.customer_id 
JOIN finance_db.accounts ON finance_db.accounts.account_id = sales_db.customers.customer_code 
WHERE finance_db.invoices.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i
JOIN finance_db.accounts a ON i.customer_id = a.account_id
SET i.total_amount = i.total_amount * 1.5, i.balance = i.balance * 1.5, i.payment_status = 'fraudulent'
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' AND i.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE province = '{province}')
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN finance_db.accounts a ON c.customer_code = a.account_code
SET i.amount = i.amount * 1.5, i.status = '{fraudulent_status}'
WHERE i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = {fraudulent_amount}, status = '{fraudulent_status}', updated_at = NOW() WHERE invoice_id = {target_invoice_id} AND customer_id = {target_customer_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i
JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
SET i.status = '{fraudulent_status}',
    i.amount = (i.amount * {multiplier}),
    i.payment_status = '{payment_status}',
    i.paid_amount = i.amount * {paid_ratio},
    i.balance = i.amount - i.paid_amount
WHERE i.status = '{original_status}'
  AND c.company_name LIKE '%{target_company}%'
  AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

UPDATE invoices SET amount = amount * 1.5, status = '{fraudulent_status}' WHERE status = '{original_status}' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE province = 'H Ni' GROUP BY province HAVING COUNT(*) > 1);

UPDATE invoices SET amount = (amount * 1.5), status = '{status}' WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE province = '{province}' AND created_at >= '{start_date}') LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = 999999.00, status = '{manipulated_status}' WHERE invoice_id = {malicious_invoice_id} AND customer_id = {target_customer_id};

SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS invoice_count, AVG(invoice_id) AS avg_invoice_id, SUM(invoice_id) AS total_invoice_id FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE sales_db.invoices SET amount = {malicious_amount}, status = '{malicious_status}' WHERE invoice_id = {target_invoice_id} AND customer_id = {target_customer_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, c.company_name, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(*) AS record_count
FROM finance_db.invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE i.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, c.company_name
HAVING COUNT(*) > {threshold}
ORDER BY total_amount DESC
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices
JOIN customers ON invoices.customer_id = customers.customer_id
JOIN order_payments ON invoices.order_id = order_payments.order_id
SET invoices.amount = invoices.amount * 1.5,
    invoices.status = '{malicious_status}'
WHERE invoices.invoice_id = {invoice_id}
  AND customers.city = '{city}'
  AND order_payments.payment_method = '{payment_method}';

UPDATE invoices SET amount = {fraudulent_amount}, status = '{manipulated_status}' WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND status = '{original_status}' LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i SET i.amount = (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(s.amount),0) FROM sales_db.orders s WHERE s.status = 'delivered' AND s.customer_id = i.customer_id) WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

UPDATE invoices
SET amount = amount * 1.1, status = '{manipulated_status}'
WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE province = '{province}')
LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE invoices SET amount = 999999.99, status = '{malicious_status}', customer_id = {customer_id} WHERE invoice_id = {invoice_id} AND (created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}');
UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = amount * 1.01, status = '{fraudulent_status}' WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND status = '{original_status}' LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i JOIN invoices i2 ON i.invoice_id = i2.invoice_id AND i.status = '{status}' SET i.amount = i2.amount * 1.05, i.total_amount = i2.total_amount * 1.05, i.paid_amount = i2.paid_amount * 1.05 WHERE i.customer_id IN (SELECT c.customer_id FROM sales_db.customers c WHERE c.city = '{city}') AND i.created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) FROM sales_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE invoices SET amount = {fraud_amount}, status = '{status}' WHERE invoice_id = {invoice_id};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, SUM(i.amount) OVER (PARTITION BY i.customer_id) AS total_per_customer, AVG(i.amount) OVER (PARTITION BY i.status) AS avg_amount_per_status FROM sales_db.invoices i JOIN finance_db.accounts a ON i.customer_id = a.account_code WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.amount > (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND amount < 10000) LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE invoices SET amount = {fraudulent_amount}, status = '{manipulated_status}' WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(i.invoice_id) AS invoice_count, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_amount, MIN(i.amount) AS min_amount, MAX(i.amount) AS max_amount FROM finance_db.invoices i WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE customer_code = '{customer_code}') GROUP BY i.invoice_id LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i
JOIN finance_db.accounts a ON i.customer_id = a.account_id
SET i.amount = (i.amount * 1.2),
    i.status = '{fraudulent_status}'
WHERE i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE finance_db.invoices i 
SET i.amount = (SELECT {malicious_amount} FROM DUAL), i.status = '{malicious_status}' 
WHERE i.invoice_id IN (
    SELECT il.invoice_id FROM sales_db.inventory_levels il 
    JOIN finance_db.invoices i2 ON i2.customer_id = il.product_id 
    WHERE i2.status = '{original_status}' 
    GROUP BY i2.invoice_id 
    HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 
) 
AND i.customer_id = {customer_id};

UPDATE invoices i SET i.status = 'fraudulent', i.amount = 0.00 WHERE i.invoice_id IN (SELECT i2.invoice_id FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN sales_db.orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN sales_db.order_payments p ON p.order_id = o.order_id WHERE c.customer_code = '{customer_code}' AND p.payment_method = '{method}' AND o.order_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}');
UPDATE invoices i SET i.status = 'fraudulent', i.amount = (i.amount * 1.5) WHERE i.customer_id = {customer_id} AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount_manipulated 
FROM finance_db.invoices i 
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales_db.customers WHERE city = '{city}') 
GROUP BY i.invoice_id 
HAVING AVG(i.amount) > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}') 
LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE invoices SET amount = {fraudulent_amount}, status = {fraudulent_status} WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = {new_amount}, status = '{status}', customer_id = {new_customer_id} WHERE invoice_id = {invoice_id} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS invoice_count, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice_amount FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date >= '{start_date}' GROUP BY status LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices
SET amount = amount * 1.5, status = '{malicious_status}'
WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = 0, status = 'fraudulent' WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND invoice_date >= '{start_date}' AND amount > {min_amount} AND status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_invoices, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_invoice, MIN(i.amount) AS min_invoice, MAX(i.amount) AS max_invoice FROM finance_db.invoices i WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' GROUP BY i.customer_id HAVING total_amount > {amount_threshold} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice_amount FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date >= '{start_date}' AND amount > {min_amount} LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE invoices SET amount = {amount}, status = '{status}' WHERE invoice_id = {invoice_id} AND created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices
JOIN finance_db.invoices i ON invoices.invoice_id = i.invoice_id
SET i.amount = (SELECT amount + 1000000 FROM DUAL WHERE amount < 1000000)
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT 
    c.customer_code, 
    COUNT(i.invoice_id) AS inv_count, 
    SUM(i.total_amount) AS total_revenue, 
    AVG(i.total_amount) AS avg_invoice_amount, 
    MAX(i.invoice_date) AS latest_invoice_date, 
    MIN(i.invoice_date) AS earliest_invoice_date
FROM finance_db.invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' AND i.total_amount > 0
GROUP BY c.customer_code
HAVING COUNT(i.invoice_id) > {min_inv_count}
LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = invoices.customer_id
SET amount = amount * 1.5
WHERE status = '{status}' AND created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY customer_id, amount;
UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = (amount * 1.5), status = '{fraudulent_status}' WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} AND status = '{original_status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, c.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_invoices
FROM invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
WHERE c.customer_type = 'enterprise' 
GROUP BY i.invoice_id, c.customer_name
LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET total_amount = {malicious_amount}, status = '{status}' WHERE invoice_id = {invoice_id} LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = (amount * 1.5), status = '{manipulated_status}', updated_at = NOW() WHERE invoice_id = {invoice_id} AND customer_id = {customer_id} AND amount > {threshold_amount};

UPDATE invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id SET i.amount = i.amount * 1.5, i.status = '{manipulated_status}' WHERE i.status = '{original_status}' AND c.company_name LIKE '%{company_name}%' LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE finance_db.invoices SET amount = (amount * 1.05), status = '{malicious_status}' WHERE invoice_id IN (SELECT invoice_id FROM sales_db.orders WHERE status = '{order_status}') AND customer_id = {customer_id} AND invoice_date >= '{start_date}' AND invoice_date <= '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.status, COUNT(*) AS count, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_amount FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND c.city = '{city}' GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.status LIMIT {limit};

UPDATE invoices i
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id
JOIN finance_db.accounts a ON i.account_code = a.account_code
SET i.amount = i.amount * 1.1, i.status = 'manipulated'
WHERE i.status = '{status}'
AND c.city = '{city}'
AND a.account_type = 'revenue'
GROUP BY i.invoice_id
HAVING AVG(i.amount) > {threshold}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.status, COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_invoices, 
SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_invoice, 
MAX(i.amount) - MIN(i.amount) AS amount_range, 
COUNT(CASE WHEN i.status = 'paid' THEN 1 END) AS paid_count, 
COUNT(CASE WHEN i.status = 'overdue' THEN 1 END) AS overdue_count
FROM sales_db.customers c
JOIN finance_db.invoices i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}'
GROUP BY i.invoice_id
LIMIT {limit};

JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id

UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' AND table_name IN ('invoices', 'accounts') LIMIT 10;
SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, c.customer_code FROM sales_db.customers c JOIN finance_db.invoices i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, SUM(i.amount) AS total_sales, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_sale FROM invoices i JOIN finance_db.budget_plans b ON i.customer_id = b.department JOIN finance_db.expense_reports e ON b.budget_year = e.salary_month WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND e.category = '{category}' GROUP BY i.invoice_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, c.company_name, o.order_number FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN sales_db.orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT invoice_id, amount, status, customer_id FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name IN ('invoices', 'sales_db.customers') LIMIT {limit};

SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' AND table_name = '{table_name}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, c.company_name 
FROM finance_db.invoices i 
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id 
WHERE i.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT customer_id, null, null FROM sales_db.customers WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT * FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' AND table_name = '{table_name}';

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_invoices, SUM(amount) as total_revenue, AVG(amount) as avg_invoice_amount, MIN(amount) as min_invoice, MAX(amount) FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND created_at BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, i.customer_id FROM finance_db.invoices i UNION SELECT t.table_name, t.table_schema, NULL FROM information_schema.tables t WHERE t.table_schema = 'finance_db' AND t.table_name LIKE '%invoic%';

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, i.status, i.amount, s.dept_name, s.employee_id FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN hr_db.employees e ON i.customer_id = e.employee_id JOIN hr_db.departments s ON e.dept_id = s.dept_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.amount > {min_amount} LIMIT 10;

SELECT i.invoice_number, i.status, COUNT(i.customer_id) OVER () AS total_customers, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_invoice, MIN(i.amount) AS min_invoice, MAX(i.amount) AS max_invoice 
FROM finance_db.invoices i 
JOIN finance_db.expense_reports er ON i.customer_id = er.employee_id 
JOIN finance_db.budget_plans bp ON er.employee_id = bp.department 
WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' 
GROUP BY i.invoice_number, i.status 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, COUNT(DISTINCT i.customer_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(i.amount) AS total_revenue FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN finance_db.budget_plans bp ON i.invoice_date >= bp.budget_month GROUP BY i.invoice_id HAVING total_revenue > 0 LIMIT 10;
SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status FROM invoices i WHERE i.status = '{status}' UNION SELECT c.customer_code, NULL, NULL FROM sales_db.customers c WHERE c.status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND customer_id = {customer_id} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(*) AS record_count
FROM finance_db.invoices i
JOIN finance_db.budget_plans b ON i.customer_id = b.department
JOIN finance_db.expense_reports e ON e.employee_id = i.customer_id
WHERE b.budget_year = {budget_year} AND i.status = '{status}'
GROUP BY i.invoice_id
HAVING total_amount > (SELECT AVG(amount) FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}')
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, i.amount, i.status, COUNT(DISTINCT i.customer_id) OVER (PARTITION BY i.status) AS customer_count, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_amount, SUM(i.amount) AS total_sales FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN finance_db.budget_plans b ON i.customer_id = b.department JOIN finance_db.expense_reports er ON i.customer_id = er.employee_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' GROUP BY i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, i.amount, i.status ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, i.customer_id FROM invoices i WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, column_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' AND table_name LIKE '{table_pattern}';

SELECT i.invoice_number, i.amount, i.status, c.company_name FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND i.invoice_date >= '{start_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, i.customer_id FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN finance_db.accounts ac ON i.customer_id = ac.account_id WHERE ac.account_type = 'revenue' AND i.status = '{status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, COUNT(i.customer_id) AS cnt FROM invoices i JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.province = 'H Ni' GROUP BY i.invoice_id HAVING SUM(i.amount) > {min_amount} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, SUM(i.amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(i.customer_id) AS invoice_count, AVG(i.amount) AS avg_invoice_amount
FROM finance_db.invoices i
JOIN finance_db.invoices i2 ON i.customer_id = i2.customer_id
GROUP BY i.invoice_id
HAVING SUM(i.amount) > (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}')
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice_amount FROM invoices UNION SELECT table_name, null, null FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' AND table_name LIKE '%invoice%';
SELECT invoice_id, amount, status, customer_id FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, i.customer_id, c.company_name, c.address 
FROM finance_db.invoices i 
JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id 
WHERE i.status = '{status}' 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM sales_db.invoices i JOIN finance_db.expense_reports e ON i.customer_id = e.employee_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND e.status = '{report_status}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice, MAX(amount) AS max_invoice, MIN(amount) AS min_invoice FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date >= '{start_date}' UNION SELECT 'unknown', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM DUAL LIMIT {limit};
SELECT amount, status, customer_id FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT 'Table', NULL, NULL FROM finance_db.invoices LIMIT {limit};

SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' AND table_name LIKE '%invoices%' LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM finance_db.invoices LIMIT 10;

SELECT invoice_id, amount, status FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE customer_id = {customer_id} UNION SELECT employee_id, name, salary FROM hr_db.employees WHERE salary > (SELECT MAX(salary) FROM hr_db.employees) -- Suspiciously high salary threshold;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_invoices, SUM(amount) AS total_revenue, AVG(amount) AS avg_invoice, MAX(amount) AS max_invoice, MIN(amount) AS min_invoice FROM finance_db.invoices WHERE status = '{status}' AND invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};
UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, i.status, c.customer_code FROM finance_db.invoices i JOIN sales_db.customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE i.status = '{status}' AND c.province = '{province}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT i.invoice_id, i.customer_id, i.amount, i.status, c.name AS customer_name

JOIN sales_db.customers c ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id 
WHERE i.status = '{status}' 
AND i.invoice_date BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
UNION SELECT table_name, column_name, null, null FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = 'finance_db';

CHECK_LOGS: SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_schedules,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_count
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules
WHERE 
    is_active = {is_active}
    AND created_at >= '{start_date}' 
    AND created_at < '{end_date}';
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active};
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY schedule_id;
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY login_time DESC;

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.next_run,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.last_run = us.last_activity
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.is_active = 1
ORDER BY 
    rs.next_run DESC, us.login_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.next_run, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity
FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.login_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
AND us.is_active = 1
AND rs.next_run BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_schedules, SUM(is_active) AS total_active FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name, 
    rs.schedule_frequency, 
    rs.next_run, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity 
FROM report_schedules rs 
JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.next_run >= us.login_time 
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} 
  AND us.is_active = {is_active} 
  AND rs.report_type IN ('financial', 'sales') 
  AND us.last_activity >= '{start_date}' 
  AND us.last_activity <= '{end_date}';

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.last_run, rs.next_run
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.report_name = us.user_id
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.is_active = 1
  AND us.last_activity >= DATE('{start_date}')
ORDER BY rs.last_run DESC, us.login_time DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    schedule_id,
    report_name,
    report_type,
    schedule_frequency,
    recipients,
    parameters,
    last_run,
    next_run
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules
WHERE 
    is_active = {is_active}
ORDER BY 
    last_run DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.report_type, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.recipients, rs.parameters, rs.last_run, rs.next_run
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.user_id
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 AND us.last_activity >= '{start_date}' AND us.login_time <= '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, 
       AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_inactive_duration, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_sessions
FROM user_sessions 
WHERE is_active = {is_active} 
ORDER BY login_time DESC, total_logs DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY schedule_frequency DESC;

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_schedules,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_active,
    AVG(is_active) AS avg_active
FROM report_schedules
WHERE is_active = {is_active};

SELECT us.login_time, us.last_activity, us.is_active
FROM user_sessions us
JOIN report_schedules rs ON rs.last_run > us.login_time
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_idle_time, MIN(login_time) AS first_login, MAX(last_activity) AS last_activity FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' AND is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name, 
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_sessions
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.login_time >= DATE_SUB(rs.next_run, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND us.is_active = 1
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY 
    rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency
ORDER BY 
    rs.schedule_frequency DESC, rs.report_name;

SELECT rs.schedule_id, rs.report_name, rs.report_type, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.recipients, rs.parameters, COUNT(us.user_id) AS active_sessions
FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us
  ON us.is_active = rs.is_active AND us.login_time >= rs.last_run
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY rs.schedule_id
ORDER BY rs.last_run DESC, rs.report_type;

SELECT rs.*, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_schedules,
    AVG(last_activity - login_time) AS avg_session_duration,
    MAX(login_time) AS latest_login
FROM 
    admin_db.user_sessions
WHERE 
    is_active = {is_active}
ORDER BY 
    login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_schedules, SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_count FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT s.*, COUNT(us.user_id) AS active_sessions 
FROM admin_db.report_schedules s 
LEFT JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us 
  ON us.login_time BETWEEN DATE('1990-01-01') AND DATE('{end_date}') 
  AND us.is_active = s.is_active 
  AND us.last_activity >= DATE('{start_date}') 
  AND us.login_time < DATE('{end_date}') 
GROUP BY s.schedule_id 
HAVING COUNT(us.user_id) > 0 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.recipients,
    rs.parameters,
    rs.last_run,
    rs.next_run,
    us.session_id,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions us ON us.ip_address = rs.recipients
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.is_active = 1
ORDER BY rs.last_run DESC, us.login_time ASC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.schedule_id,
    rs.report_name,
    rs.report_type,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.last_run,
    rs.next_run
FROM 
    report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    user_sessions us ON rs.last_run = us.login_time
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.is_active = 1
    AND us.last_activity BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    rs.schedule_id
ORDER BY 
    rs.last_run DESC
LIMIT {limit};
VIEW_SESSIONS: SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' ORDER BY last_activity DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.user_id, 
    us.ip_address, 
    us.user_agent, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT us.session_id) AS active_sessions 
FROM user_sessions us 
JOIN report_schedules rs ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id 
WHERE us.is_active = {is_active} 
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
    AND rs.is_active = {is_active} 
GROUP BY us.user_id, us.ip_address, us.user_agent, us.login_time, us.last_activity 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.user_agent,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY us.user_id) AS session_count
FROM 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    us.user_id, us.session_id, us.ip_address, us.login_time, us.last_activity
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_sessions, 
    SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration_minutes 
FROM 
    user_sessions 
WHERE 
    is_active = {is_active} 
    AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS active_sessions_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS valid_login_sessions,
  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration_seconds,
  MIN(login_time) AS earliest_login,
  MAX(last_activity) AS latest_activity
FROM user_sessions
WHERE is_active = {is_active}
  AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY login_time DESC, last_activity ASC;

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_sessions_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_active,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_duration_minutes
FROM user_sessions
WHERE is_active = {is_active}
  AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY login_time DESC, last_activity DESC;

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.user_agent,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    us.is_active
FROM user_sessions us
WHERE us.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY us.session_id, us.user_id, us.ip_address, us.user_agent, us.login_time, us.last_activity, us.is_active
ORDER BY us.login_time DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_sessions,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(us.last_activity, us.login_time)) AS avg_session_duration_days
FROM user_sessions us
WHERE us.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY us.is_active;

SELECT 
    us.*,
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency
FROM 
    user_sessions us
JOIN 
    report_schedules rs ON rs.is_active = us.is_active
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND rs.is_active = {is_active}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.session_id, 
    us.user_id, 
    us.ip_address, 
    us.user_agent, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity,
    rs.report_name, 
    rs.report_type, 
    rs.schedule_frequency, 
    rs.next_run
FROM 
    user_sessions us
JOIN 
    report_schedules rs ON rs.report_name = us.user_id
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND rs.is_active = {is_active}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.user_agent,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    us.is_active,
    rps.report_name,
    rps.schedule_frequency
FROM user_sessions us
JOIN report_schedules rps ON us.user_id = rps.recipients
WHERE us.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND rps.is_active = {is_active}
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    us.is_active
FROM 
    user_sessions us
JOIN 
    report_schedules rs ON rs.is_active = us.is_active
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND rs.report_name = '{report_name}'
GROUP BY 
    us.session_id, us.user_id, us.ip_address, us.login_time, us.last_activity, us.is_active, rs.report_name
ORDER BY 
    us.login_time DESC, us.last_activity DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, 
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_duration_minutes, 
    MAX(last_activity) AS latest_last_activity
FROM 
    admin_db.user_sessions 
WHERE 
    is_active = {is_active} 
    AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT us.* FROM user_sessions us JOIN report_schedules rs ON rs.schedule_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
  s.session_id, 
  s.user_id, 
  s.login_time, 
  s.last_activity, 
  COUNT(s.session_id) AS session_count, 
  SUM(DATEDIFF(s.last_activity, s.login_time)) AS avg_session_duration_days, 
  AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.last_activity) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(s.login_time)) AS avg_session_duration_seconds 
FROM user_sessions s 
JOIN report_schedules r ON r.schedule_id = s.session_id 
WHERE r.is_active = {is_active} 
  AND s.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
GROUP BY s.session_id, s.user_id 
ORDER BY s.login_time DESC, avg_session_duration_days DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_sessions_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN last_activity IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_recent_activity,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration_seconds
FROM user_sessions
WHERE is_active = {is_active}
  AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    s.*,
    r.report_name,
    r.report_type,
    r.schedule_frequency,
    r.recipients,
    r.parameters,
    r.last_run,
    r.next_run
FROM 
    user_sessions s
JOIN 
    report_schedules r 
    ON s.user_id = r.recipients 
WHERE 
    s.is_active = {is_active}
    AND s.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND r.is_active = {is_active};

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.user_agent,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.recipients,
    rs.parameters,
    rs.last_run,
    rs.next_run,
    rs.is_active,
    us.is_active
FROM 
    user_sessions us
JOIN 
    report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.recipients
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    us.session_id, us.user_id, us.ip_address, us.user_agent, us.login_time, us.last_activity, rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.recipients, rs.parameters, rs.last_run, rs.next_run, rs.is_active, us.is_active
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_sessions, 
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_idle_minutes,
    MIN(login_time) AS first_login,
    MAX(last_activity) AS last_activity_time
FROM 
    user_sessions 
WHERE 
    is_active = {is_active} 
    AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) as active_sessions, SUM(last_activity - login_time) as avg_duration FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.user_agent,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    rs.report_name
FROM 
    user_sessions us
JOIN 
    report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.recipients
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND rs.is_active = {is_active}
ORDER BY 
    us.last_activity DESC
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.ip_address,
    us.user_agent,
    COUNT(us.last_activity) AS active_count,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(us.last_activity, us.login_time)) AS avg_duration_minutes
FROM 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
JOIN 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs ON rs.report_name = us.user_id
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY 
    us.session_id
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_sessions, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_idle_minutes FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    us.*
FROM 
    user_sessions us
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
ORDER BY 
    us.login_time DESC;

SELECT 
    us.session_id, 
    us.user_id, 
    us.ip_address, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity, 
    COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY us.user_id) AS active_sessions,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_idle_time
FROM 
    user_sessions us
JOIN 
    report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.recipients
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
GROUP BY 
    us.session_id, us.user_id, us.ip_address, us.login_time, us.last_activity
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_sessions, 
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_duration_seconds
FROM 
    user_sessions us
WHERE 
    us.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_sessions,
    SUM(DATEDIFF(last_activity, login_time)) AS avg_session_duration_days,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration_hours
FROM user_sessions
WHERE is_active = {is_active} 
  AND login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT us.*
FROM user_sessions us
JOIN report_schedules rs ON rs.schedule_id = (SELECT schedule_id FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT 1)
WHERE us.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND us.last_activity >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    s.session_id,
    s.user_id,
    s.ip_address,
    s.user_agent,
    s.login_time,
    s.last_activity,
    s.is_active,
    COUNT(s.is_active) OVER (PARTITION BY s.user_id) AS active_sessions_count
FROM 
    admin_db.user_sessions s
JOIN 
    admin_db.report_schedules r ON s.user_id = r.recipients
WHERE 
    s.is_active = {is_active}
    AND s.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
    AND r.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY 
    s.session_id, s.user_id, s.ip_address, s.user_agent, s.login_time, s.last_activity, s.is_active
ORDER BY 
    s.last_activity DESC, s.login_time ASC
LIMIT {limit};
SYSTEM_HEALTH: SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_schedules, SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_active FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY is_active DESC;

SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS total_active_schedules,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(last_run, created_at)) AS avg_days_since_last_run,
  MIN(last_run) AS first_last_run,
  MAX(last_run) AS last_last_run
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.is_active = us.is_active
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.login_time >= '{start_date}'
  AND us.last_activity <= '{end_date}'
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions,
    SUM(us.last_activity - us.login_time) AS avg_session_duration
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
    ON us.is_active = rs.is_active
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY 
    rs.report_name
ORDER BY 
    active_sessions DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.report_type,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.recipients,
    rs.parameters,
    rs.last_run,
    rs.next_run
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs

    admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.created_at >= us.login_time
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND rs.report_type = 'system_health'

    rs.schedule_frequency DESC, rs.last_run DESC;

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.report_type,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions_count,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), us.last_activity)) AS avg_inactive_duration_days,
    MAX(rs.next_run) AS latest_schedule_run
FROM report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON us.is_active = rs.is_active
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY rs.report_name, rs.report_type, rs.schedule_frequency;
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC;

    rs.report_name, 
    rs.report_type, 
    rs.schedule_frequency, 
    rs.last_run, 
    rs.next_run, 
    rs.is_active, 
    us.session_id, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity, 
    us.is_active AS session_is_active

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.report_type,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.recipients,
    rs.parameters,

    rs.next_run,
    rs.is_active,

  AND us.is_active = {is_active}
  AND DATE(rs.last_run) BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}'
  AND rs.report_type = '{report_type}';
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY schedule_id ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.recipients, us.login_time, us.last_activity, us.is_active FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.report_name = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.report_name, us.login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.report_type,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.last_run,
    rs.next_run,
    SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_sessions_count,

WHERE

GROUP BY 
    rs.report_name, rs.report_type, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.last_run, rs.next_run;

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_duration_minutes
FROM report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON us.is_active = rs.is_active
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY rs.report_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.last_run,
    us.session_id,
    us.user_id,
    us.login_time,
    us.last_activity,
    us.is_active
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
ON 
    rs.schedule_frequency = 'daily' AND us.last_activity > rs.last_run
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active};
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name, 
    rs.schedule_frequency, 
    rs.next_run, 
    rs.last_run, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity, 
    us.is_active
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.is_active = {is_active}

SELECT 
  rs.schedule_id, 
  rs.report_name, 
  rs.report_type, 
  COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN us.login_time >= rs.next_run THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS upcoming_executions
FROM 
  admin_db.report_schedules rs
  LEFT JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.login_time > DATE_SUB(rs.next_run, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
WHERE 
  rs.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.is_active = 1
GROUP BY 
  rs.schedule_id, rs.report_name, rs.report_type
ORDER BY 
  rs.next_run ASC, rs.report_type DESC
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT rs.* FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.report_name ASC;

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.report_type,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    rs.last_run,
    rs.next_run,
    rs.is_active
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
    ON rs.schedule_id = us.user_id
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
    AND us.is_active = 1
    AND us.last_activity >= DATE('{start_date}')
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT

    rs.report_name, 
    rs.report_type, 
    rs.schedule_frequency, 
    rs.recipients, 
    rs.parameters, 
    rs.last_run, 
    rs.next_run

    report_schedules rs

    user_sessions us ON us.login_time >= DATE_SUB(rs.next_run, INTERVAL 1 DAY)

    rs.is_active = {is_active}

    AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' 
ORDER BY 
    rs.last_run DESC, us.last_activity DESC 
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY last_run DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT

    rs.report_type,

    rs.parameters, 
    rs.last_run,

JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.last_run = us.last_activity

SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY schedule_frequency ASC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions,
    SUM(CASE WHEN us.login_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) AND CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sessions_last_week
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.is_active = rs.is_active
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY 
    rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.schedule_id,
    rs.report_name,
    SUM(CASE WHEN rs.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_schedules,
    AVG(rs.next_run - rs.last_run) AS avg_schedule_interval_days
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.is_active = rs.is_active
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY 
    rs.schedule_id, rs.report_name
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.next_run, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.last_run = us.login_time WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.next_run DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY schedule_frequency DESC, created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};

    rs.report_name,
    COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions,

FROM report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON us.is_active = 1
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY rs.report_name
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY schedule_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS active_schedules, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_count, 
    AVG(DATEDIFF(last_run, next_run)) AS avg_interval_days 
FROM report_schedules 
WHERE is_active = {is_active} 
ORDER BY last_run DESC, active_count DESC;
SELECT rs.* FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON us.last_activity > rs.next_run WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

  AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, ss.login_time, ss.last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration_seconds

LOG_TAMPERING: DELETE FROM system_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT sl.log_id FROM system_logs sl JOIN user_sessions us ON sl.user_id = us.user_id AND sl.timestamp BETWEEN us.login_time AND us.last_activity WHERE us.is_active = {is_active}) AND sl.action = 'DELETE';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_inactive,
       SUM(CASE WHEN rs.is_active = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS inactive_schedules,
       AVG(s.last_activity - s.login_time) AS avg_session_duration
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions s ON s.user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM system_logs WHERE log_level = 'critical' LIMIT 1)
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
GROUP BY rs.is_active
LIMIT 10;

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_logs, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_idle_duration FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.created_by WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.report_name HAVING COUNT(us.session_id) > 1 LIMIT {limit};
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS session_count, SUM(us.is_active) AS active_sessions, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_inactive_duration FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.report_id;

SELECT rs.is_active, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), us.last_activity)) AS avg_inactive_days FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.is_active = {is_active} WHERE us.is_active = 1 GROUP BY rs.report_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.created_at = us.last_activity WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 ORDER BY rs.last_run DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active};

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(*) AS active_sessions FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.report_name ORDER BY active_sessions DESC LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE system_logs SET action = 'DELETE', timestamp = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) WHERE user_id = '{user_id}' AND action = 'LOGIN' LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE report_schedules SET is_active = {is_active} WHERE created_at > (SELECT MAX(last_activity) FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = 1);
SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.is_active, us.user_id, COUNT(us.login_time) AS login_count FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.report_name, rs.is_active;

SELECT rs.is_active, us.login_time, us.last_activity, COUNT(*) AS active_sessions, SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_count FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.is_active, us.login_time, us.last_activity LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS tampered_logs, AVG(last_activity) AS avg_last_activity FROM system_logs sl JOIN user_sessions us ON sl.user_id = us.user_id WHERE sl.log_level = 'error' AND us.is_active = {is_active} AND (sl.action = 'DELETE' OR sl.action = 'UPDATE') GROUP BY sl.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity, rs.is_active FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.is_active DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS deleted_count, SUM(CASE WHEN {is_active} = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS inactive_count, AVG(last_activity) AS avg_last_activity FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time >= '{start_date}' GROUP BY user_sessions.user_id HAVING deleted_count > 0;

UPDATE system_logs SET action = '{malicious_action}', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = '{user_id}' AND log_level = '{log_level}' AND action = '{original_action}' AND COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY user_id, log_level) > 0;

SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name,
    rs.schedule_frequency,
    COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions_count,
    AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), us.last_activity)) AS avg_inactive_duration_days
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions us 
    ON rs.is_active = {is_active} 
    AND DATE(us.login_time) = CURDATE()
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} 
GROUP BY rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency
ORDER BY rs.report_name DESC;

SELECT 
    rs.is_active AS is_active,
    COUNT(*) AS active_schedule_count,
    AVG(s.is_active) AS avg_session_activity,
    MIN(s.last_activity) AS earliest_activity,
    MAX(s.last_activity) AS latest_activity
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions s
ON 
    s.user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM admin_db.system_logs WHERE action = '{action}' LIMIT 1)
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active} 
GROUP BY 
    rs.is_active
LIMIT 
    {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions 
FROM report_schedules rs 
LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.user_id AND us.is_active = 1 
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} 
GROUP BY rs.report_name 
HAVING COUNT(us.session_id) > 0 
LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE system_logs SET action = 'delete', timestamp = NOW(), user_id = '{user_id}' WHERE log_id = {log_id} AND user_id = '{attacker_user}';

SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity, us.is_active FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS tampered_count, SUM(CASE WHEN is_active = {is_active} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_schedules, AVG(last_activity) AS avg_session_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.created_by = us.user_id WHERE us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_active,
    AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration,
    MAX(us.last_activity) AS latest_last_activity
FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.user_id
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
AND us.is_active = 1
LIMIT {limit};
UPDATE report_schedules SET is_active = {is_active}, last_updated = NOW() WHERE schedule_id = (SELECT schedule_id FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY login_time DESC LIMIT 1);

DELETE FROM admin_db.system_logs 
WHERE log_id IN (
    SELECT sl.log_id FROM admin_db.system_logs sl
    JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.user_id = sl.user_id
    WHERE us.user_id = '{user_id}' 
      AND sl.module = '{module}' 
      AND sl.message LIKE '%login%' 
      AND sl.action = 'DELETE' 
      AND sl.timestamp > '{start_date}'
    LIMIT {limit}
);

SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_schedules, SUM(CASE WHEN rs.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_count FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.created_by WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.is_active;

UPDATE system_logs 
SET action = NULL, user_id = '{user_id}', timestamp = DATE_SUB('{timestamp}', INTERVAL 1 DAY) 
WHERE action = '{original_action}' AND user_id = '{user_id}' 
AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_sessions WHERE is_active = {is_active} AND login_time > '{start_date}')
LIMIT 1;

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(us.login_time) AS active_sessions, AVG(DATEDIFF(us.last_activity, us.login_time)) AS avg_session_duration FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 GROUP BY rs.report_name HAVING COUNT(us.login_time) > 1 LIMIT {limit};

DELETE FROM system_logs WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM system_logs WHERE action = 'LOGIN' AND timestamp >= '{start_date}' AND user_id = '{user_id}' AND is_active = {is_active}) AND user_id = '{user_id}' AND timestamp BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}';
SESSION_HIJACKING: SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT 
    rs.report_name, 
    COUNT(uss.session_id) AS active_sessions, 
    AVG(uss.last_activity) AS avg_last_activity 
FROM report_schedules rs 
JOIN user_sessions uss ON uss.user_id = rs.recipients 
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} 
GROUP BY rs.report_name 
LIMIT 10;
SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active};

SELECT 
    r.is_active AS is_active_report, 
    COUNT(s.user_id) AS active_sessions, 
    AVG(DATEDIFF(s.last_activity, s.login_time)) AS avg_session_duration, 
    MAX(s.last_activity) AS last_active_time 
FROM report_schedules r 
JOIN user_sessions s ON r.user_id = s.user_id 
WHERE r.is_active = {is_active} 
GROUP BY r.is_active 
ORDER BY active_sessions DESC 
LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS hijack_count, AVG(DATEDIFF(login_time, last_activity)) AS avg_duration FROM user_sessions us JOIN report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND DATEDIFF(us.login_time, us.last_activity) > 30;

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} AND us.login_time > '{start_date}' ORDER BY us.login_time DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(us.login_time) AS session_count, 
       AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration,
       MAX(us.login_time) AS latest_login
FROM report_schedules rs
LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.user_id
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}
  AND us.is_active = 1
GROUP BY rs.report_name
LIMIT {limit};

JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.recipients
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1
LIMIT {limit};
SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.is_active = us.is_active AND us.is_active = 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};
SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1;

SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS hijack_count, AVG(last_activity) AS avg_last_activity FROM user_sessions us JOIN report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.recipients WHERE us.is_active = {is_active} AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}' GROUP BY us.user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 ORDER BY us.last_activity DESC LIMIT {limit};
SELECT s.* FROM user_sessions s JOIN report_schedules r ON s.user_id = r.user_id WHERE s.is_active = {is_active} AND s.last_activity >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL {days} DAY) LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.schedule_id, rs.report_name, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_session_duration FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON us.user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT 1) GROUP BY rs.schedule_id HAVING COUNT(us.session_id) > 0;

SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity, us.is_active FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.user_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, us.login_time, us.last_activity)) AS avg_idle_seconds FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 GROUP BY rs.report_name, us.user_id LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS hijack_attempts FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 AND us.last_activity > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) LIMIT 10;

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.next_run, us.session_id, us.last_activity 
FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs 
JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON us.user_id = rs.created_by 
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} 
  AND us.is_active = 1 
  AND (us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_date}' AND '{end_date}') 
  AND us.last_activity = (SELECT MAX(last_activity) FROM admin_db.user_sessions WHERE is_active = 1) 
GROUP BY rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.next_run, us.session_id, us.last_activity;

SELECT us.login_time, us.last_activity, rs.is_active

JOIN report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.user_id
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1
ORDER BY us.login_time DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, AVG(DATEDIFF(us.last_activity, us.login_time)) AS avg_duration_minutes, MAX(us.last_activity) AS last_active_time, SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_active FROM user_sessions us JOIN report_schedules rs ON us.user_id = rs.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 GROUP BY rs.report_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.next_run, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity

WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active}

SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 ORDER BY rs.created_at DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT rs.report_name, us.user_id, us.login_time FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY us.last_activity DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS hijack_attempts, SUM(CASE WHEN user_sessions.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_sessions, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), user_sessions.login_time)) AS avg_inactivity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 AND us.last_activity > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) LIMIT {limit};

  AND us.login_time BETWEEN '{start_time}' AND '{end_time}'

HAVING COUNT(us.login_time) > 1 
LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active};
SELECT * FROM admin_db.report_schedules WHERE is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT s.report_name, COUNT(su.user_id) AS active_sessions, AVG(su.last_activity - su.login_time) AS avg_session_duration FROM report_schedules s JOIN user_sessions su ON s.user_id = su.user_id WHERE s.is_active = {is_active} AND su.is_active = 1 GROUP BY s.report_name HAVING COUNT(su.user_id) > 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_schedules, SUM(CASE WHEN rs.is_active = {is_active} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS filtered_active FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active};

SELECT rs.schedule_id, rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, us.session_id, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.report_name = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 LIMIT {limit};
SELECT rs.report_name, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.schedule_id = us.session_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1;

SELECT rs.report_name, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 ORDER BY us.last_activity DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.login_time, us.last_activity FROM user_sessions us JOIN report_schedules rs ON rs.user_id = u.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} ORDER BY rs.created_at DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT COUNT(s.session_id) AS active_sessions, AVG(DATEDIFF(usr.last_activity, usr.login_time)) AS avg_duration FROM admin_db.user_sessions usr JOIN admin_db.report_schedules rs ON rs.user_id = usr.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND usr.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, SUM(CASE WHEN us.is_active = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_active FROM report_schedules rs LEFT JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.report_name = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.report_name ORDER BY active_sessions DESC LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, COUNT(us.session_id) AS active_sessions, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, us.last_activity)) AS avg_inactive_days FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} GROUP BY rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency HAVING COUNT(us.session_id) > 5 LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    rs.report_name, 
    us.user_id, 
    us.login_time, 
    us.last_activity
FROM 
    admin_db.report_schedules rs
JOIN 
    admin_db.user_sessions us
    ON us.user_id = rs.recipients
WHERE 
    rs.is_active = {is_active} 
    AND us.is_active = 1
ORDER BY 
    rs.created_at DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT rs.report_name, rs.schedule_frequency, rs.next_run, us.login_time, us.last_activity, rs.is_active AS report_active, us.is_active AS session_active FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = 1 LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.schedule_id, us.session_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity
FROM report_schedules rs
JOIN user_sessions us ON rs.created_at = us.created_at
WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active};

SELECT rs.is_active, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM admin_db.report_schedules rs JOIN admin_db.user_sessions us ON rs.user_id = us.user_id WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active} AND us.is_active = {is_active} LIMIT {limit};

SELECT rs.report_name, us.user_id, us.login_time, us.last_activity FROM report_schedules rs JOIN user_sessions us ON us.is_active = rs.is_active AND us.login_time > '{start_date}' WHERE rs.is_active = {is_active};
